  - javascripts/code-copy.js
    1. åˆ›å»ºå¤åˆ¶æŒ‰é’®æ ·å¼ï¼š
    CSS
    /* docs/stylesheets/code-copy.css */

/* å¤åˆ¶æŒ‰é’®å®¹å™¨ */
.copy-button {
  position: absolute;
  right: 0.5rem;
  top: 0.5rem;
  padding: 0.4rem;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  border: none;
  border-radius: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

/* æŒ‰é’®æ‚¬åœæ•ˆæœ */
.copy-button:hover {
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

/* å›¾æ ‡æ ·å¼ */
.copy-button i {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: var(--md-default-fg-color--light);
}

/* æˆåŠŸçŠ¶æ€ */
.copy-button.success {
  background-color: var(--md-accent-fg-color);
}

.copy-button.success i {
  color: white;
}
    1. å®ç°å¤åˆ¶åŠŸèƒ½ï¼š
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/code-copy.js
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  // ä¸ºæ‰€æœ‰ä»£ç å—æ·»åŠ å¤åˆ¶æŒ‰é’®
  const codeBlocks = document.querySelectorAll('pre code');

  codeBlocks.forEach((codeBlock) => {
    const container = codeBlock.parentNode;
    const copyButton = document.createElement('button');
    copyButton.className = 'copy-button';
    copyButton.innerHTML = '<i class="material-icons">content_copy</i>';
    container.style.position = 'relative';
    container.appendChild(copyButton);

    // æ·»åŠ ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
    copyButton.addEventListener('click', async () => {
      try {
        await navigator.clipboard.writeText(codeBlock.textContent);
        showSuccess(copyButton);
      } catch (err) {
        showError(copyButton);
      }
    });
  });
});
    6.2.3.2 æç¤ºæ¶ˆæ¯ Â¶
    1. åˆ›å»ºæç¤ºæ¶ˆæ¯æ ·å¼ï¼š
    CSS
    /* æç¤ºæ¶ˆæ¯æ ·å¼ */
.copy-tooltip {
  position: absolute;
  top: -2rem;
  right: 0;
  padding: 0.4rem 0.8rem;
  background-color: var(--md-default-fg-color);
  color: var(--md-default-bg-color);
  border-radius: 4px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(0.4rem);
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.copy-tooltip.show {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
}
    1. å®ç°æç¤ºåŠŸèƒ½ï¼š
    JavaScript
    // æ˜¾ç¤ºæç¤ºæ¶ˆæ¯
function showTooltip(button, message, type = 'success') {
  const tooltip = document.createElement('div');
  tooltip.className = `copy-tooltip ${type}`;
  tooltip.textContent = message;
  button.appendChild(tooltip);

  // æ·»åŠ æ˜¾ç¤ºç±»
  setTimeout(() => tooltip.classList.add('show'), 10);

  // è‡ªåŠ¨ç§»é™¤
  setTimeout(() => {
    tooltip.classList.remove('show');
    setTimeout(() => tooltip.remove(), 200);
  }, 2000);
}

// æˆåŠŸæç¤º
function showSuccess(button) {
  button.classList.add('success');
  showTooltip(button, 'å¤åˆ¶æˆåŠŸï¼');
  setTimeout(() => button.classList.remove('success'), 2000);
}

// é”™è¯¯æç¤º
function showError(button) {
  button.classList.add('error');
  showTooltip(button, 'å¤åˆ¶å¤±è´¥ï¼', 'error');
  setTimeout(() => button.classList.remove('error'), 2000);
}
    6.2.3.3 å¤åˆ¶å›è°ƒ Â¶
    JavaScript
    // å®šä¹‰å¤åˆ¶äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†å™¨
const copyHandlers = {
  // å¤åˆ¶å‰å¤„ç†
  beforeCopy: (code) => {
    // å¯ä»¥åœ¨è¿™é‡Œå¯¹ä»£ç è¿›è¡Œé¢„å¤„ç†
    return code.trim();
  },

  // å¤åˆ¶æˆåŠŸå›è°ƒ
  onSuccess: (button, code) => {
    console.log('Copied:', code.length, 'characters');
    showSuccess(button);

    // è§¦å‘è‡ªå®šä¹‰äº‹ä»¶
    const event = new CustomEvent('codeCopied', {
      detail: { code }
    });
    document.dispatchEvent(event);
  },

  // å¤åˆ¶å¤±è´¥å›è°ƒ
  onError: (button, error) => {
    console.error('Copy failed:', error);
    showError(button);
  }
};

// ä½¿ç”¨å›è°ƒ
async function copyCode(button, code) {
  try {
    const processedCode = copyHandlers.beforeCopy(code);
    await navigator.clipboard.writeText(processedCode);
    copyHandlers.onSuccess(button, processedCode);
  } catch (err) {
    copyHandlers.onError(button, err);
  }
}

    6.2.4 å›¾ç‰‡é¢„è§ˆ Â¶

    6.2.4.1 lightbox é…ç½® Â¶
    1. åœ¨ mkdocs.yml ä¸­é…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    markdown_extensions:
  - attr_list
  - md_in_html

plugins:
  - glightbox

extra_css:
  - stylesheets/glightbox.css
extra_javascript:
  - javascripts/glightbox.js
    1. é…ç½® GLightboxï¼š
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/glightbox.js
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  const lightbox = GLightbox({
    selector: '.glightbox',
    touchNavigation: true,
    loop: false,
    autoplayVideos: true,
    preload: true,
    // åŸºæœ¬è®¾ç½®
    height: 'auto',
    zoomable: true,
    draggable: true,
    // åŠ¨ç”»è®¾ç½®
    openEffect: 'zoom',
    closeEffect: 'fade',
    cssEfects: {
      fade: { in: 'fadeIn', out: 'fadeOut' },
      zoom: { in: 'zoomIn', out: 'zoomOut' }
    }
  });
});
    6.2.4.2 ç¼©æ”¾åŠŸèƒ½ Â¶
    JavaScript
    // ç¼©æ”¾åŠŸèƒ½é…ç½®
const zoomConfig = {
  // ç¼©æ”¾é€‰é¡¹
  zoomable: true,
  dragToZoom: true,
  touchToZoom: true,

  // ç¼©æ”¾çº§åˆ«
  minZoom: 0.5,
  maxZoom: 3,
  zoomStep: 0.5,

  // åŒå‡»ç¼©æ”¾
  doubleTapZoom: 2,

  // ç¼©æ”¾åŠ¨ç”»
  zoomAnimation: true,
  zoomDuration: 300,

  // ç¼©æ”¾æ§åˆ¶å™¨
  controls: {
    zoom: true,
    zoomIn: true,
    zoomOut: true,
    rotate: true
  }
};

// åº”ç”¨ç¼©æ”¾é…ç½®
const lightbox = GLightbox({
  ...zoomConfig,

  // ç¼©æ”¾äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†
  onZoom: (slider) => {
    const { zoom, image } = slider;
    console.log(`Current zoom level: ${zoom}`);
  }
});
    6.2.4.3 æ‰‹åŠ¿æ”¯æŒ Â¶
    JavaScript
    // æ‰‹åŠ¿é…ç½®
const gestureConfig = {
  // è§¦æ‘¸å¯¼èˆª
  touchNavigation: true,
  touchFollowAxis: true,

  // æ‹–åŠ¨è®¾ç½®
  draggable: true,
  dragToleranceX: 40,
  dragToleranceY: 65,

  // æ‰‹åŠ¿äº‹ä»¶
  gestures: {
    // æåˆç¼©æ”¾
    pinchToZoom: true,
    pinchThreshold: 50,

    // åŒæŒ‡æ—‹è½¬
    rotateToZoom: true,
    rotateThreshold: 15,

    // æ»‘åŠ¨åˆ‡æ¢
    swipeThreshold: 50,
    swipeToClose: true
  }
};

// æ‰‹åŠ¿äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†
const gestureHandlers = {
  // è§¦æ‘¸å¼€å§‹
  onTouchStart: (e) => {
    const touch = e.touches[0];
    startX = touch.clientX;
    startY = touch.clientY;
  },

  // è§¦æ‘¸ç§»åŠ¨
  onTouchMove: (e) => {
    if (!isDragging) return;
    const touch = e.touches[0];
    const deltaX = touch.clientX - startX;
    const deltaY = touch.clientY - startY;

    // å¤„ç†ç§»åŠ¨
    handleImageMove(deltaX, deltaY);
  },

  // è§¦æ‘¸ç»“æŸ
  onTouchEnd: (e) => {
    isDragging = false;
    // å¤„ç†æƒ¯æ€§æ»‘åŠ¨
    handleMomentum();
  }
};

// åˆ›å»ºå¢å¼ºçš„å›¾ç‰‡é¢„è§ˆ
const enhancedLightbox = GLightbox({
  ...zoomConfig,
  ...gestureConfig,

  // äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬
  listeners: {
    touchstart: gestureHandlers.onTouchStart,
    touchmove: gestureHandlers.onTouchMove,
    touchend: gestureHandlers.onTouchEnd
  }
});
    6.2.4.4 å®Œæ•´ç¤ºä¾‹ Â¶
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/image-preview.js
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  // åˆå§‹åŒ–é…ç½®
  const config = {
    // åŸºç¡€è®¾ç½®
    selector: '.glightbox',
    touchNavigation: true,
    loop: false,

    // ç¼©æ”¾è®¾ç½®
    zoomable: true,
    draggable: true,
    dragToleranceX: 40,
    dragToleranceY: 65,

    // åŠ¨ç”»è®¾ç½®
    openEffect: 'zoom',
    closeEffect: 'fade',

    // æ‰‹åŠ¿è®¾ç½®
    touchFollowAxis: true,

    // ç•Œé¢è®¾ç½®
    preload: true,
    height: 'auto',

    // äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†
    onOpen: () => {
      console.log('Lightbox opened');
    },
    onClose: () => {
      console.log('Lightbox closed');
    },
    onZoom: (slider) => {
      console.log('Image zoomed');
    }
  };

  // åˆå§‹åŒ– GLightbox
  const lightbox = GLightbox(config);

  // æ·»åŠ é”®ç›˜æ”¯æŒ
  document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
    if (!lightbox.isOpen) return;

    switch(e.key) {
      case 'ArrowLeft':
        lightbox.prev();
        break;
      case 'ArrowRight':
        lightbox.next();
        break;
      case 'Escape':
        lightbox.close();
        break;
    }
  });
});

    6.3 è‡ªå®šä¹‰åŠŸèƒ½ Â¶

    6.3.1 é¡µé¢äº¤äº’ Â¶

    6.3.1.1 æ»šåŠ¨äº‹ä»¶ Â¶
    1. åŸºç¡€æ»šåŠ¨ç›‘å¬ï¼š
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/scroll.js
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // æ»šåŠ¨å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°
    function handleScroll() {
        const scrollTop = window.scrollY;
        const windowHeight = window.innerHeight;
        const docHeight = document.documentElement.scrollHeight;

        // æ»šåŠ¨è¿›åº¦
        const scrollPercent = (scrollTop / (docHeight - windowHeight)) * 100;

        // æ›´æ–°è¿›åº¦æ¡
        updateProgress(scrollPercent);

        // å¤„ç†å…ƒç´ å¯è§æ€§
        handleVisibility();
    }

    // ä½¿ç”¨èŠ‚æµä¼˜åŒ–æ»šåŠ¨äº‹ä»¶
    const throttledScroll = throttle(handleScroll, 100);
    window.addEventListener('scroll', throttledScroll);
});

// èŠ‚æµå‡½æ•°
function throttle(fn, delay) {
    let lastCall = 0;
    return function(...args) {
        const now = Date.now();
        if (now - lastCall >= delay) {
            lastCall = now;
            fn.apply(this, args);
        }
    };
}
    1. å…ƒç´ å¯è§æ€§æ£€æµ‹ï¼š
    JavaScript
    // æ£€æµ‹å…ƒç´ æ˜¯å¦è¿›å…¥è§†å£
function handleVisibility() {
    const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.animate-on-scroll');

    elements.forEach(element => {
        const rect = element.getBoundingClientRect();
        const isVisible = (
            rect.top >= 0 &&
            rect.left >= 0 &&
            rect.bottom <= window.innerHeight &&
            rect.right <= window.innerWidth
        );

        if (isVisible) {
            element.classList.add('is-visible');
        }
    });
}

// CSS æ ·å¼
.animate-on-scroll {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(20px);
    transition: all 0.6s ease;
}

.animate-on-scroll.is-visible {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
}
    6.3.1.2 ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶ Â¶
    1. ç‚¹å‡»å¤„ç†ï¼š
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/click.js
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // ä»£ç å—ç‚¹å‡»å¤åˆ¶
    setupCodeCopy();

    // å›¾ç‰‡ç‚¹å‡»æ”¾å¤§
    setupImageZoom();

    // ç›®å½•ç‚¹å‡»æ»šåŠ¨
    setupTocScroll();
});

// ä»£ç å¤åˆ¶åŠŸèƒ½
function setupCodeCopy() {
    const codeBlocks = document.querySelectorAll('pre code');

    codeBlocks.forEach(block => {
        block.addEventListener('click', async function(e) {
            if (e.target.classList.contains('copy-button')) {
                try {
                    await navigator.clipboard.writeText(block.textContent);
                    showToast('å¤åˆ¶æˆåŠŸï¼');
                } catch (err) {
                    showToast('å¤åˆ¶å¤±è´¥', 'error');
                }
            }
        });
    });
}

// å›¾ç‰‡ç¼©æ”¾åŠŸèƒ½
function setupImageZoom() {
    const images = document.querySelectorAll('.md-content img');

    images.forEach(img => {
        img.addEventListener('click', function() {
            const overlay = document.createElement('div');
            overlay.className = 'image-overlay';
            overlay.innerHTML = `
                <img src="${img.src}" alt="${img.alt}">
                <button class="close-button">Ã—</button>
            `;

            document.body.appendChild(overlay);

            overlay.querySelector('.close-button').addEventListener('click', () => {
                overlay.remove();
            });
        });
    });
}
    6.3.1.3 é”®ç›˜äº‹ä»¶ Â¶
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/keyboard.js
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // é”®ç›˜å¯¼èˆª
    setupKeyboardNav();

    // æœç´¢å¿«æ·é”®
    setupSearchShortcut();
});

// é”®ç›˜å¯¼èˆª
function setupKeyboardNav() {
    document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
        // ALT + æ–¹å‘é”®å¯¼èˆª
        if (e.altKey) {
            switch(e.key) {
                case 'ArrowLeft':  // ä¸Šä¸€é¡µ
                    navigatePage('prev');
                    break;
                case 'ArrowRight':  // ä¸‹ä¸€é¡µ
                    navigatePage('next');
                    break;
                case 'ArrowUp':    // å›åˆ°é¡¶éƒ¨
                    window.scrollTo({top: 0, behavior: 'smooth'});
                    break;
                case 'ArrowDown':  // åˆ°è¾¾åº•éƒ¨
                    window.scrollTo({
                        top: document.documentElement.scrollHeight,
                        behavior: 'smooth'
                    });
                    break;
            }
        }
    });
}

// æœç´¢å¿«æ·é”®
function setupSearchShortcut() {
    document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
        // æŒ‰ä¸‹ '/' é”®è§¦å‘æœç´¢
        if (e.key === '/' && !e.ctrlKey && !e.altKey && !e.metaKey) {
            e.preventDefault();
            const searchInput = document.querySelector('.md-search__input');
            if (searchInput) {
                searchInput.focus();
            }
        }
    });
}

    6.3.2 åŠ¨ç”»æ•ˆæœ Â¶

    6.3.2.1 è¿‡æ¸¡åŠ¨ç”» Â¶
    1. åŸºç¡€è¿‡æ¸¡æ•ˆæœï¼š

    /* docs/stylesheets/transitions.css */

/* é¡µé¢åˆ‡æ¢è¿‡æ¸¡ */
.md-content {
    animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(20px);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
    }
}

/* å¯¼èˆªè¿‡æ¸¡ */
.md-nav__link {
    transition: color 0.2s ease, padding-left 0.2s ease;
}

.md-nav__link:hover {
    padding-left: 0.5rem;
    color: var(--md-accent-fg-color);
}
    1. é¡µé¢åˆ‡æ¢åŠ¨ç”»ï¼š
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/transitions.js
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // é¡µé¢åˆ‡æ¢åŠ¨ç”»
    setupPageTransitions();
});

function setupPageTransitions() {
    // ç›‘å¬é¡µé¢åˆ‡æ¢äº‹ä»¶
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        document.body.classList.add('page-transition-ready');
    });

    // é¡µé¢ç¦»å¼€åŠ¨ç”»
    window.addEventListener('beforeunload', function() {
        document.body.classList.add('page-transition-exit');
    });
}
    6.3.2.2 åŠ è½½åŠ¨ç”» Â¶
    1. åˆ›å»ºåŠ è½½åŠ¨ç”»ï¼š
    CSS
    /* docs/stylesheets/loading.css */

/* åŠ è½½åŠ¨ç”»å®¹å™¨ */
.loading-overlay {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    background-color: var(--md-default-bg-color);
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    z-index: 999;
    opacity: 1;
    transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
}

/* åŠ è½½åŠ¨ç”» */
.loading-spinner {
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    border: 3px solid var(--md-primary-fg-color--light);
    border-top-color: var(--md-primary-fg-color);
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
    to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}
    1. å®ç°åŠ è½½é€»è¾‘ï¼š
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/loading.js
class LoadingManager {
    constructor() {
        this.overlay = null;
        this.createLoadingOverlay();
    }

    createLoadingOverlay() {
        this.overlay = document.createElement('div');
        this.overlay.className = 'loading-overlay';
        this.overlay.innerHTML = '<div class="loading-spinner"></div>';
        document.body.appendChild(this.overlay);
    }

    show() {
        this.overlay.style.opacity = '1';
        this.overlay.style.visibility = 'visible';
    }

    hide() {
        this.overlay.style.opacity = '0';
        setTimeout(() => {
            this.overlay.style.visibility = 'hidden';
        }, 300);
    }
}

// ä½¿ç”¨åŠ è½½ç®¡ç†å™¨
const loading = new LoadingManager();

// é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæˆåéšè—
window.addEventListener('load', () => {
    loading.hide();
});
    6.3.2.3 äº¤äº’åŠ¨ç”» Â¶
    1. å…ƒç´ äº¤äº’åŠ¨ç”»ï¼š
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/interactions.js
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // æŒ‰é’®æ³¢çº¹æ•ˆæœ
    setupRippleEffect();

    // å¡ç‰‡æ‚¬æµ®æ•ˆæœ
    setupCardHover();

    // åˆ—è¡¨é¡¹åŠ¨ç”»
    setupListAnimations();
});

// æ³¢çº¹æ•ˆæœ
function setupRippleEffect() {
    const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.md-button');

    buttons.forEach(button => {
        button.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            const ripple = document.createElement('div');
            ripple.className = 'ripple';

            const rect = button.getBoundingClientRect();
            const size = Math.max(rect.width, rect.height);

            ripple.style.width = ripple.style.height = `${size}px`;
            ripple.style.left = `${e.clientX - rect.left - size/2}px`;
            ripple.style.top = `${e.clientY - rect.top - size/2}px`;

            button.appendChild(ripple);

            setTimeout(() => ripple.remove(), 600);
        });
    });
}

// å¡ç‰‡æ‚¬æµ®æ•ˆæœ
function setupCardHover() {
    const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.md-card');

    cards.forEach(card => {
        card.addEventListener('mousemove', function(e) {
            const rect = card.getBoundingClientRect();
            const x = e.clientX - rect.left;
            const y = e.clientY - rect.top;

            const centerX = rect.width / 2;
            const centerY = rect.height / 2;

            const angleY = -(x - centerX) / 20;
            const angleX = (y - centerY) / 20;

            card.style.transform = 
                `perspective(1000px) rotateX(${angleX}deg) rotateY(${angleY}deg)`;
        });

        card.addEventListener('mouseleave', function() {
            card.style.transform = 'perspective(1000px) rotateX(0) rotateY(0)';
        });
    });
}

    6.3.3 æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡ Â¶

    6.3.3.1 è®¿é—®ç»Ÿè®¡ Â¶
    1. åŸºç¡€è®¿é—®ç»Ÿè®¡ï¼š
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/analytics.js
class Analytics {
    constructor() {
        this.storageKey = 'site_analytics';
        this.data = this.loadData();
    }

    loadData() {
        const stored = localStorage.getItem(this.storageKey);
        return stored ? JSON.parse(stored) : {
            pageViews: {},
            totalVisits: 0,
            firstVisit: Date.now(),
            lastVisit: Date.now()
        };
    }

    saveData() {
        localStorage.setItem(this.storageKey, JSON.stringify(this.data));
    }

    recordPageView() {
        const path = window.location.pathname;
        this.data.pageViews[path] = (this.data.pageViews[path] || 0) + 1;
        this.data.totalVisits++;
        this.data.lastVisit = Date.now();
        this.saveData();
    }

    getStats() {
        return {
            totalVisits: this.data.totalVisits,
            uniquePages: Object.keys(this.data.pageViews).length,
            mostViewed: this.getMostViewedPages(5)
        };
    }

    getMostViewedPages(limit = 5) {
        return Object.entries(this.data.pageViews)
            .sort(([,a], [,b]) => b - a)
            .slice(0, limit);
    }
}
    6.3.3.2 é˜…è¯»æ—¶é•¿ Â¶
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/read-time.js
class ReadTimeTracker {
    constructor() {
        this.startTime = Date.now();
        this.isReading = true;
        this.totalTime = 0;
        this.idleTimeout = null;
        this.setupTracking();
    }

    setupTracking() {
        // ç›‘å¬ç”¨æˆ·æ´»åŠ¨
        ['mousemove', 'keydown', 'scroll', 'click'].forEach(event => {
            document.addEventListener(event, () => this.handleActivity());
        });

        // é¡µé¢å¤±ç„¦æš‚åœè®¡æ—¶
        document.addEventListener('visibilitychange', () => {
            if (document.hidden) {
                this.pauseTracking();
            } else {
                this.resumeTracking();
            }
        });
    }

    handleActivity() {
        if (!this.isReading) {
            this.resumeTracking();
        }

        clearTimeout(this.idleTimeout);
        this.idleTimeout = setTimeout(() => this.pauseTracking(), 60000); // 1åˆ†é’Ÿæ— æ´»åŠ¨æš‚åœ
    }

    pauseTracking() {
        if (this.isReading) {
            this.totalTime += Date.now() - this.startTime;
            this.isReading = false;
        }
    }

    resumeTracking() {
        if (!this.isReading) {
            this.startTime = Date.now();
            this.isReading = true;
        }
    }

    getReadTime() {
        const currentTime = this.isReading ? 
            this.totalTime + (Date.now() - this.startTime) : 
            this.totalTime;

        return Math.floor(currentTime / 1000 / 60); // è¿”å›åˆ†é’Ÿ
    // æ˜¾ç¤ºé˜…è¯»æ—¶é•¿
    displayReadTime() {
        const readTimeElement = document.querySelector('.read-time');
        if (readTimeElement) {
            const minutes = this.getReadTime();
            readTimeElement.textContent = `é˜…è¯»æ—¶é•¿: ${minutes} åˆ†é’Ÿ`;
        }
    }

    // è·å–é˜…è¯»è¿›åº¦
    getReadProgress() {
        const windowHeight = window.innerHeight;
        const docHeight = document.documentElement.scrollHeight - windowHeight;
        const scrollTop = window.pageYOffset || document.documentElement.scrollTop;
        return Math.min((scrollTop / docHeight) * 100, 100);
    }

    // ä¿å­˜é˜…è¯»è®°å½•
    saveReadingHistory() {
        const path = window.location.pathname;
        const history = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('reading_history') || '{}');

        history[path] = {
            lastRead: Date.now(),
            readTime: this.getReadTime(),
            progress: this.getReadProgress()
        };

        localStorage.setItem('reading_history', JSON.stringify(history));
    }
}

// åˆå§‹åŒ–é˜…è¯»æ—¶é•¿è¿½è¸ª
const readTracker = new ReadTimeTracker();

// å®šæœŸæ›´æ–°æ˜¾ç¤º
setInterval(() => {
    readTracker.displayReadTime();
}, 30000); // æ¯30ç§’æ›´æ–°ä¸€æ¬¡

// é¡µé¢ç¦»å¼€æ—¶ä¿å­˜è®°å½•
window.addEventListener('beforeunload', () => {
    readTracker.saveReadingHistory();
});
    6.3.3.3 åˆ†äº«ç»Ÿè®¡ Â¶
    1. åˆ†äº«åŠŸèƒ½å’Œç»Ÿè®¡ï¼š
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/share.js
class ShareTracker {
    constructor() {
        this.storageKey = 'share_statistics';
        this.data = this.loadData();
        this.setupShareButtons();
    }

    loadData() {
        return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(this.storageKey) || '{}');
    }

    saveData() {
        localStorage.setItem(this.storageKey, JSON.stringify(this.data));
    }

    setupShareButtons() {
        const shareButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.share-button');

        shareButtons.forEach(button => {
            button.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                const platform = button.dataset.platform;
                this.shareContent(platform);
                this.recordShare(platform);
            });
        });
    }

    shareContent(platform) {
        const url = encodeURIComponent(window.location.href);
        const title = encodeURIComponent(document.title);
        const description = encodeURIComponent(
            document.querySelector('meta[name="description"]')?.content || ''
        );

        let shareUrl;
        switch (platform) {
            case 'twitter':
                shareUrl = `https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=${url}&text=${title}`;
                break;
            case 'facebook':
                shareUrl = `https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=${url}`;
                break;
            case 'linkedin':
                shareUrl = `https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=${url}`;
                break;
            case 'weibo':
                shareUrl = `http://service.weibo.com/share/share.php?url=${url}&title=${title}`;
                break;
        }

        if (shareUrl) {
            window.open(shareUrl, '_blank', 'width=600,height=400');
        }
    }

    recordShare(platform) {
        const path = window.location.pathname;
        if (!this.data[path]) {
            this.data[path] = {};
        }
        if (!this.data[path][platform]) {
            this.data[path][platform] = 0;
        }
        this.data[path][platform]++;
        this.saveData();
        this.updateShareCount(platform);
    }

    updateShareCount(platform) {
        const countElement = document.querySelector(`.share-count[data-platform="${platform}"]`);
        if (countElement) {
            const path = window.location.pathname;
            countElement.textContent = this.data[path][platform] || 0;
        }
    }

    getShareStats() {
        return Object.entries(this.data).map(([path, platforms]) => ({
            path,
            total: Object.values(platforms).reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0),
            platforms
        }));
    }

    displayShareStats() {
        const stats = this.getShareStats();
        console.table(stats);
        return stats;
    }
}
    1. ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®å¯è§†åŒ–ï¼š
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/statistics-visualization.js
class StatisticsVisualizer {
    constructor(analytics, readTracker, shareTracker) {
        this.analytics = analytics;
        this.readTracker = readTracker;
        this.shareTracker = shareTracker;
    }

    createDashboard() {
        const dashboard = document.createElement('div');
        dashboard.className = 'statistics-dashboard';
        dashboard.innerHTML = `
            <div class="dashboard-section">
                <h3>è®¿é—®ç»Ÿè®¡</h3>
                <div class="stats-grid">
                    <div class="stat-card">
                        <div class="stat-value">${this.analytics.data.totalVisits}</div>
                        <div class="stat-label">æ€»è®¿é—®é‡</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="stat-card">
                        <div class="stat-value">${this.readTracker.getReadTime()}</div>
                        <div class="stat-label">æ€»é˜…è¯»æ—¶é•¿(åˆ†é’Ÿ)</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="stat-card">
                        <div class="stat-value">${this.getTotalShares()}</div>
                        <div class="stat-label">æ€»åˆ†äº«æ¬¡æ•°</div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div id="visitsChart"></div>
            </div>
        `;

        document.body.appendChild(dashboard);
        this.renderCharts();
    }

    renderCharts() {
        // ä½¿ç”¨ Chart.js ç»˜åˆ¶å›¾è¡¨
        const ctx = document.getElementById('visitsChart').getContext('2d');
        new Chart(ctx, {
            type: 'line',
            data: {
                labels: this.getTimeLabels(),
                datasets: [{
                    label: 'è®¿é—®è¶‹åŠ¿',
                    data: this.getVisitData(),
                    borderColor: 'rgb(75, 192, 192)',
                    tension: 0.1
                }]
            },
            options: {
                responsive: true,
                scales: {
                    y: {
                        beginAtZero: true
                    }
                }
            }
        });
    }

    getTotalShares() {
        const stats = this.shareTracker.getShareStats();
        return stats.reduce((total, page) => total + page.total, 0);
    }

    getTimeLabels() {
        // è·å–æœ€è¿‘7å¤©çš„æ—¥æœŸæ ‡ç­¾
        return Array.from({length: 7}, (_, i) => {
            const d = new Date();
            d.setDate(d.getDate() - i);
            return d.toLocaleDateString();
        }).reverse();
    }

    getVisitData() {
        // å¤„ç†è®¿é—®æ•°æ®
        return this.analytics.getVisitsByDate(7);
    }
}

// æ ·å¼
const styles = `
    .statistics-dashboard {
        padding: 2rem;
        background: var(--md-default-bg-color);
        border-radius: 8px;
        box-shadow: var(--md-shadow-z2);
    }

    .stats-grid {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
        gap: 1rem;
        margin: 1rem 0;
    }

    .stat-card {
        padding: 1rem;
        background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
        border-radius: 4px;
        text-align: center;
    }

    .stat-value {
        font-size: 2rem;
        font-weight: bold;
        color: var(--md-primary-fg-color);
    }

    .stat-label {
        font-size: 0.9rem;
        color: var(--md-default-fg-color--light);
        margin-top: 0.5rem;
    }
`;

// å°†æ ·å¼æ·»åŠ åˆ°æ–‡æ¡£
const styleSheet = document.createElement('style');
styleSheet.textContent = styles;
document.head.appendChild(styleSheet);

// åˆå§‹åŒ–ç»Ÿè®¡å¯è§†åŒ–
const visualizer = new StatisticsVisualizer(analytics, readTracker, shareTracker);
visualizer.createDashboard();

    è¿™æ ·æˆ‘ä»¬å°±å®Œæˆäº†å®Œæ•´çš„æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡ç³»ç»Ÿï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ï¼š

    1. è®¿é—®ç»Ÿè®¡
    2. é˜…è¯»æ—¶é•¿è¿½è¸ª
    3. åˆ†äº«ç»Ÿè®¡
    4. æ•°æ®å¯è§†åŒ–å±•ç¤º

    ä½¿ç”¨æ—¶ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦åœ¨ mkdocs.yml ä¸­æ·»åŠ ç›¸åº”çš„ JavaScript æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š

    YAML
    extra_javascript:
  - javascripts/analytics.js
  - javascripts/read-time.js
  - javascripts/share.js
  - javascripts/statistics-visualization.js
  - https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js

    ç„¶ååœ¨é¡µé¢ä¸­æ·»åŠ å¿…è¦çš„ HTML å…ƒç´ å³å¯å¯ç”¨è¿™äº›åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

    7 æ¨¡æ¿å¤å†™ Â¶

    7.1 é‡å†™é¡µé¢æ¨¡æ¿ Â¶

    7.1.1 ä¸»é¡µæ¨¡æ¿ Â¶

    7.1.1.1 å¸ƒå±€ç»“æ„ Â¶
    1. åˆ›å»ºè‡ªå®šä¹‰ä¸»é¡µæ¨¡æ¿ï¼š
    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/main.html -->
{% extends "base.html" %}

{% block hero %}
<section class="home-hero">
    <div class="hero-content">
        <h1>{{ config.site_name }}</h1>
        <p>{{ config.site_description }}</p>

        <!-- è‡ªå®šä¹‰æœç´¢æ¡† -->
        <div class="hero-search">
            <input type="text" placeholder="æœç´¢æ–‡æ¡£..." id="hero-search-input">
            <button>
                <span class="twemoji">
                    {% include ".icons/material/magnify.svg" %}
                </span>
            </button>
        </div>

        <!-- å¿«é€Ÿå…¥å£ -->
        <div class="hero-buttons">
            <a href="{{ page.next_page.url | url }}" class="md-button md-button--primary">
                å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å§‹
                <span class="twemoji">
                    {% include ".icons/material/arrow-right.svg" %}
                </span>
            </a>
            <a href="{{ config.repo_url }}" class="md-button">
                æŸ¥çœ‹æºç 
                <span class="twemoji">
                    {% include ".icons/material/github.svg" %}
                </span>
            </a>
        </div>
    </div>
</section>
{% endblock %}

{% block content %}
<section class="home-features">
    <h2>ç‰¹è‰²åŠŸèƒ½</h2>
    <div class="features-grid">
        <!-- åŠŸèƒ½å¡ç‰‡ -->
        <div class="feature-card">
            <div class="feature-icon">
                {% include ".icons/material/speedometer.svg" %}
            </div>
            <h3>é«˜æ€§èƒ½</h3>
            <p>åŸºäºé™æ€ç«™ç‚¹ç”Ÿæˆï¼ŒåŠ è½½è¿…é€Ÿ</p>
        </div>
        <!-- æ›´å¤šåŠŸèƒ½å¡ç‰‡ -->
    </div>
</section>

<!-- æœ€è¿‘æ›´æ–° -->
<section class="home-updates">
    <h2>æœ€è¿‘æ›´æ–°</h2>
    <div class="updates-list">
        {% for update in config.theme.updates[:5] %}
        <div class="update-item">
            <span class="update-date">{{ update.date }}</span>
            <a href="{{ update.url | url }}">{{ update.title }}</a>
        </div>
        {% endfor %}

</section>

    1. ä¸»é¡µæ ·å¼ï¼š
    CSS
    /* docs/stylesheets/home.css */

/* ä¸»é¡µè‹±é›„åŒº */
.home-hero {
    min-height: 100vh;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    text-align: center;
    background: linear-gradient(
        to bottom right,
        var(--md-primary-fg-color),
        var(--md-accent-fg-color)
    );
    color: var(--md-primary-bg-color);
}

.hero-content {
    max-width: 800px;
    padding: 2rem;
}

.hero-content h1 {
    font-size: 3rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

/* æœç´¢æ¡†æ ·å¼ */
.hero-search {
    margin: 2rem 0;
    position: relative;
}

.hero-search input {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 1rem 3rem 1rem 1rem;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 2rem;
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
    color: white;
    backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

/* åŠŸèƒ½åŒºæ ·å¼ */
.features-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
    gap: 2rem;
    padding: 2rem;
}

.feature-card {
    padding: 2rem;
    background: var(--md-default-bg-color);
    border-radius: 8px;
    box-shadow: var(--md-shadow-z1);
    transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.feature-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-4px);
}

/* æ›´æ–°åˆ—è¡¨æ ·å¼ */
.updates-list {
    max-width: 800px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 2rem;
}

.update-item {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 1rem;
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--md-default-fg-color--lightest);
}

/* å“åº”å¼é€‚é… */

    .hero-content h1 {
        font-size: 2rem;
    }

    .features-grid {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }
}
    7.1.1.2 ç»„ä»¶é…ç½® Â¶
    1. åœ¨ mkdocs.yml ä¸­é…ç½®ä¸»é¢˜ï¼š
    YAML
    theme:
  name: material
  custom_dir: docs/overrides
  features:
    - navigation.tabs
    - navigation.sections
    - navigation.expand

  # ä¸»é¡µé…ç½®
  homepage:
    hero:
      title: ç½‘ç«™æ ‡é¢˜
      subtitle: ç½‘ç«™æè¿°
      image: assets/hero.svg

    # åŠŸèƒ½ç‰¹æ€§
    features:
      - title: é«˜æ€§èƒ½
        description: åŸºäºé™æ€ç«™ç‚¹ç”Ÿæˆï¼ŒåŠ è½½è¿…é€Ÿ
        icon: material/speedometer
      - title: æ˜“äºä½¿ç”¨
        description: ç®€å•çš„é…ç½®ï¼Œå¿«é€Ÿä¸Šæ‰‹
        icon: material/puzzle
      # æ›´å¤šåŠŸèƒ½ç‰¹æ€§...

    # æ›´æ–°åˆ—è¡¨
    updates:
      - date: 2024-01-20
        title: æ–°å¢åŠŸèƒ½A
        url: /new-feature-a
      - date: 2024-01-18
        title: é—®é¢˜ä¿®å¤B
        url: /bug-fix-b
      # æ›´å¤šæ›´æ–°...
    1. ä¸»é¡µåŠŸèƒ½ç±»ï¼š
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/home.js
class HomePage {
    constructor() {
        this.searchInput = document.getElementById('hero-search-input');
        this.setupSearch();
        this.setupFeatureCards();
    }

    setupSearch() {
        this.searchInput?.addEventListener('keyup', (e) => {
            if (e.key === 'Enter') {
                const query = e.target.value;
                window.location.href = `${window.location.origin}/search.html?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
            }
        });
    }

    setupFeatureCards() {
        const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.feature-card');

        cards.forEach(card => {
            card.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
                const rect = card.getBoundingClientRect();
                const x = e.clientX - rect.left;
                const y = e.clientY - rect.top;

                card.style.setProperty('--mouse-x', `${x}px`);
                card.style.setProperty('--mouse-y', `${y}px`);
            });
        });
    }
}

// åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸»é¡µ
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    new HomePage();
});
    7.1.1.3 è‡ªå®šä¹‰åŒºåŸŸ Â¶
    1. åˆ›å»ºè‡ªå®šä¹‰åŒºåŸŸï¼š
    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/partials/custom-content.html -->
{% if page.meta.custom_content %}
<section class="custom-content">
    <!-- å…¬å‘ŠåŒº -->
    {% if page.meta.announcements %}
    <div class="announcements">
        {% for announcement in page.meta.announcements %}
        <div class="announcement-item">
            <span class="announcement-tag">{{ announcement.tag }}</span>
            <p>{{ announcement.content }}</p>
        </div>
        {% endfor %}
    </div>
    {% endif %}

    <!-- è´¡çŒ®è€…åŒºåŸŸ -->
    {% if page.meta.contributors %}
    <div class="contributors">
        <h3>é¡¹ç›®è´¡çŒ®è€…</h3>
        <div class="contributors-grid">
            {% for contributor in page.meta.contributors %}
            <a href="{{ contributor.url }}" class="contributor-card">
                <img src="{{ contributor.avatar }}" alt="{{ contributor.name }}">
                <span>{{ contributor.name }}</span>
            </a>
            {% endfor %}
        </div>
    </div>
    {% endif %}

    <!-- èµåŠ©å•†åŒºåŸŸ -->
    {% if page.meta.sponsors %}
    <div class="sponsors">
        <h3>èµåŠ©å•†</h3>
        <div class="sponsors-grid">
            {% for sponsor in page.meta.sponsors %}
            <a href="{{ sponsor.url }}" class="sponsor-card">
                <img src="{{ sponsor.logo }}" alt="{{ sponsor.name }}">
            </a>
            {% endfor %}
        </div>
    </div>
    {% endif %}
</section>
{% endif %}
    1. è‡ªå®šä¹‰åŒºåŸŸæ ·å¼ï¼š
    CSS
    /* docs/stylesheets/custom-content.css */

/* å…¬å‘ŠåŒºåŸŸ */
.announcements {
    margin: 2rem 0;
}

.announcement-item {
    padding: 1rem;
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    border-radius: 4px;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.announcement-tag {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 0.2rem 0.5rem;
    background: var(--md-accent-fg-color);
    color: white;
    border-radius: 2rem;
    font-size: 0.8rem;
    margin-right: 0.5rem;
}

/* è´¡çŒ®è€…åŒºåŸŸ */
.contributors-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(100px, 1fr));
    gap: 1rem;
    margin: 1rem 0;
}

.contributor-card {
    text-align: center;
    text-decoration: none;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color);
}

.contributor-card img {
    width: 60px;
    height: 60px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

/* èµåŠ©å•†åŒºåŸŸ */
.sponsors-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(150px, 1fr));
    gap: 2rem;
    margin: 1rem 0;
}

.sponsor-card img {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    filter: grayscale(100%);
    transition: filter 0.3s ease;
}

.sponsor-card:hover img {
    filter: grayscale(0%);
}

    7.1.2 æ–‡ç« æ¨¡æ¿ Â¶

    7.1.2.1 æ–‡ç« å¤´éƒ¨ Â¶
    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/partials/article-header.html -->
<header class="article-header">
    <!-- æ–‡ç« æ ‡é¢˜ -->
    <h1>{{ page.title }}</h1>

    <!-- æ–‡ç« å…ƒä¿¡æ¯ -->
    <div class="article-meta">
        {% if page.meta.author %}
        <div class="meta-item">
            <span class="meta-icon">
                {% include ".icons/material/account.svg" %}
            </span>
            <span>{{ page.meta.author }}</span>
        </div>
        {% endif %}

        {% if page.meta.date %}
        <div class="meta-item">
            <span class="meta-icon">
                {% include ".icons/material/calendar.svg" %}
            </span>
            <span>{{ page.meta.date }}</span>
        </div>
        {% endif %}

        {% if page.meta.tags %}
        <div class="article-tags">
            {% for tag in page.meta.tags %}
            <a href="{{ base_url }}/tags/#{{ tag }}" class="tag">
                # {{ tag }}
            </a>
            {% endfor %}
        </div>
        {% endif %}
    </div>

    <!-- æ–‡ç« æ¦‚è¿° -->
    {% if page.meta.description %}
    <div class="article-description">
        {{ page.meta.description }}
    </div>
    {% endif %}
</header>
    7.1.2.2 æ­£æ–‡æ ·å¼ Â¶
    CSS
    /* docs/stylesheets/article.css */

/* æ–‡ç« å®¹å™¨ */
.md-content article {
    max-width: 800px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 2rem;
}

/* æ–‡ç« å¤´éƒ¨ */
.article-header {
    margin-bottom: 3rem;
    text-align: center;
}

.article-meta {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 1rem;
    margin: 1rem 0;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color--light);
}

.meta-item {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
}

.article-tags {
    margin-top: 1rem;
}

.tag {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 0.2rem 0.5rem;
    margin: 0.2rem;
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    border-radius: 2rem;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color);
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 0.8rem;
}

/* æ–‡ç« å†…å®¹æ ·å¼ */
.md-content article {
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    line-height: 1.8;
}

/* æ ‡é¢˜æ ·å¼ */
.md-content article h2 {
    margin-top: 3rem;
    padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
    border-bottom: 2px solid var(--md-default-fg-color--lightest);
}

/* ä»£ç å—æ ·å¼ */
.md-content pre {
    border-radius: 8px;
    margin: 1.5rem 0;
}

/* å¼•ç”¨æ ·å¼ */
.md-content blockquote {
    border-left: 4px solid var(--md-accent-fg-color);
    padding: 1rem;
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    margin: 1.5rem 0;
}

/* å›¾ç‰‡æ ·å¼ */
.md-content img {
    max-width: 100%;
    border-radius: 8px;
    margin: 1.5rem 0;
}
    7.1.2.3 åº•éƒ¨ä¿¡æ¯ Â¶
    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/partials/article-footer.html -->
<footer class="article-footer">
    <!-- æ–‡ç« å¯¼èˆª -->
    <nav class="article-nav">
        {% if page.previous_page %}
        <a href="{{ page.previous_page.url | url }}" class="nav-link nav-prev">
            <span class="nav-icon">
                {% include ".icons/material/arrow-left.svg" %}
            </span>
            <span class="nav-text">
                <span class="nav-direction">ä¸Šä¸€ç¯‡</span>
                <span class="nav-title">{{ page.previous_page.title }}</span>
            </span>
        </a>
        {% endif %}

        {% if page.next_page %}
        <a href="{{ page.next_page.url | url }}" class="nav-link nav-next">
            <span class="nav-text">
                <span class="nav-direction">ä¸‹ä¸€ç¯‡</span>
                <span class="nav-title">{{ page.next_page.title }}</span>
            </span>
            <span class="nav-icon">
                {% include ".icons/material/arrow-right.svg" %}
            </span>
        </a>
        {% endif %}
    </nav>

    <!-- åˆ†äº«æŒ‰é’® -->
    <div class="article-share">
        <h4>åˆ†äº«æ–‡ç« </h4>
        <div class="share-buttons">
            <button class="share-button" data-platform="twitter">
                {% include ".icons/material/twitter.svg" %}
            </button>
            <button class="share-button" data-platform="facebook">
                {% include ".icons/material/facebook.svg" %}
            </button>
            <button class="share-button" data-platform="linkedin">
                {% include ".icons/material/linkedin.svg" %}
            </button>
            <button class="share-button" data-platform="weibo">
                {% include ".icons/material/sina-weibo.svg" %}
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- ç›¸å…³æ–‡ç«  -->
    {% if page.meta.related_posts %}
    <div class="related-posts">
        <h4>ç›¸å…³æ–‡ç« </h4>
        <div class="related-grid">
            {% for post in page.meta.related_posts %}
            <a href="{{ post.url | url }}" class="related-post">
                {% if post.image %}
                <img src="{{ post.image }}" alt="{{ post.title }}">
                {% endif %}
                <h5>{{ post.title }}</h5>
                <p>{{ post.excerpt }}</p>
            </a>
            {% endfor %}
        </div>
    </div>
    {% endif %}

    <!-- è¯„è®ºåŒº -->
    <div class="article-comments">
        <h4>è¯„è®º</h4>
        {% if config.extra.comments.provider == 'giscus' %}
        <script src="https://giscus.app/client.js"
            data-repo="{{ config.extra.comments.repo }}"
            data-repo-id="{{ config.extra.comments.repo_id }}"
            data-category="{{ config.extra.comments.category }}"
            data-category-id="{{ config.extra.comments.category_id }}"
            data-mapping="pathname"
            data-reactions-enabled="1"
            data-emit-metadata="0"
            data-theme="light"
            crossorigin="anonymous"
            async>
        </script>
        {% endif %}
    </div>
</footer>

<!-- æ–‡ç« åº•éƒ¨æ ·å¼ -->
<style>
.article-footer {
    margin-top: 4rem;
    padding-top: 2rem;
    border-top: 1px solid var(--md-default-fg-color--lightest);
}

/* æ–‡ç« å¯¼èˆª */
.article-nav {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.nav-link {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 1rem;
    text-decoration: none;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color);
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    border-radius: 8px;
    transition: transform 0.2s ease;
    max-width: 45%;
}

.nav-link:hover {
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.nav-text {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
}

.nav-direction {
    font-size: 0.8rem;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color--light);
}

.nav-title {
    font-weight: 500;
}

/* åˆ†äº«æŒ‰é’® */
.share-buttons {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1rem;
    margin: 1rem 0;
}

.share-button {
    padding: 0.8rem;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.share-button:hover {
    background: var(--md-accent-fg-color);
    color: white;
}

/* ç›¸å…³æ–‡ç«  */
.related-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
    gap: 1.5rem;
    margin: 1rem 0;
}

.related-post {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color);
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    border-radius: 8px;
    overflow: hidden;
    transition: transform 0.2s ease;
}

.related-post:hover {
    transform: translateY(-4px);
}

.related-post img {
    width: 100%;
    height: 150px;
    object-fit: cover;
}

.related-post h5 {
    margin: 1rem;
    font-size: 1.1rem;
}

.related-post p {
    margin: 0 1rem 1rem;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color--light);
}

/* è¯„è®ºåŒº */
.article-comments {
    margin-top: 3rem;
}

/* å“åº”å¼é€‚é… */
@media screen and (max-width: 76.1875em) {
    .article-nav {
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: 1rem;
    }

    .nav-link {
        max-width: 100%;
    }

    .related-grid {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }
}
</style>

    7.1.3 404 é¡µé¢ Â¶

    7.1.3.1 é”™è¯¯æç¤º Â¶
    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/404.html -->
{% extends "base.html" %}

{% block content %}
<div class="error-page">
    <div class="error-content">
        <!-- 404 å›¾æ ‡ -->
        <div class="error-icon">
            {% include ".icons/material/alert-circle-outline.svg" %}
            <span class="error-code">404</span>
        </div>

        <!-- é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯ -->
        <h1>é¡µé¢æœªæ‰¾åˆ°</h1>
        <p>æŠ±æ­‰ï¼Œæ‚¨è®¿é—®çš„é¡µé¢ä¸å­˜åœ¨æˆ–å·²è¢«ç§»åŠ¨</p>

        <!-- æœç´¢æ¡† -->
        <div class="error-search">
            <input type="text" 
                   id="error-search-input" 
                   placeholder="å°è¯•æœç´¢..."
                   autocomplete="off">
            <button id="error-search-button">
                {% include ".icons/material/magnify.svg" %}
            </button>
        </div>

        <!-- å¿«æ·æ“ä½œ -->
        <div class="error-actions">
            <a href="{{ base_url }}" class="md-button md-button--primary">
                è¿”å›é¦–é¡µ
            </a>
            <button class="md-button" onclick="window.history.back()">
                è¿”å›ä¸Šé¡µ
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- æœç´¢å»ºè®® -->
    <div class="search-suggestions" id="search-suggestions">
        <h3>æ‚¨æ˜¯å¦åœ¨æ‰¾ï¼š</h3>
        <div class="suggestions-list" id="suggestions-list">
            <!-- åŠ¨æ€ç”Ÿæˆçš„å»ºè®®åˆ—è¡¨ -->
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<!-- 404é¡µé¢æ ·å¼ -->
<style>
.error-page {
    min-height: 100vh;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    padding: 2rem;
    text-align: center;
}

.error-content {
    max-width: 600px;
}

.error-icon {
    font-size: 6rem;
    color: var(--md-primary-fg-color);
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
    position: relative;
}

.error-code {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: -1rem;
    right: -1rem;
    font-size: 2rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    background: var(--md-accent-fg-color);
    color: white;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    border-radius: 1rem;
}

.error-search {
    margin: 2rem 0;
    position: relative;
}

.error-search input {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 1rem 3rem 1rem 1rem;
    border: 2px solid var(--md-default-fg-color--lightest);
    border-radius: 2rem;
    font-size: 1.1rem;
}

.error-search button {
    position: absolute;
    right: 0.5rem;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    background: none;
    border: none;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color);
    cursor: pointer;
}

.error-actions {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1rem;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 2rem 0;
}

/* æœç´¢å»ºè®®æ ·å¼ */
.search-suggestions {
    margin-top: 3rem;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 600px;
}

.suggestions-list {
    margin-top: 1rem;
}

.suggestion-item {
    padding: 1rem;
    margin: 0.5rem 0;
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    border-radius: 8px;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.suggestion-item:hover {
    background: var(--md-accent-fg-color--transparent);
}

/* å“åº”å¼é€‚é… */
@media screen and (max-width: 76.1875em) {
    .error-icon {
        font-size: 4rem;
    }

    .error-code {
        font-size: 1.5rem;
    }

    .error-actions {
        flex-direction: column;
    }
}
</style>

<!-- 404é¡µé¢è„šæœ¬ -->
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // æœç´¢å»ºè®®åŠŸèƒ½
    setupSearchSuggestions();
    // å…¨å±€çƒ­é”®
    setupHotkeys();
});

function setupSearchSuggestions() {
    const searchInput = document.getElementById('error-search-input');
    const suggestionsList = document.getElementById('suggestions-list');

    searchInput?.addEventListener('input', debounce(async (e) => {
        const query = e.target.value;
        if (query.length < 2) {
            suggestionsList.innerHTML = '';
            return;
        }

        // è·å–æœç´¢å»ºè®®
        const suggestions = await getSearchSuggestions(query);

        // æ¸²æŸ“å»ºè®®åˆ—è¡¨
        suggestionsList.innerHTML = suggestions
            .map(suggestion => `
                <div class="suggestion-item" onclick="window.location.href='${suggestion.url}'">
                    <div class="suggestion-title">${suggestion.title}</div>
                    <div class="suggestion-excerpt">${suggestion.excerpt}</div>
                </div>
            `)
            .join('');
    }, 300));
}

async function getSearchSuggestions(query) {
    // è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥å®ç°å®é™…çš„æœç´¢é€»è¾‘
    // ç¤ºä¾‹è¿”å›æ•°æ®
    return [
        {
            title: 'ç›¸å…³æ–‡æ¡£ 1',
            excerpt: 'è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€æ®µç›¸å…³çš„æ–‡æ¡£æè¿°...',
            url: '#'
        },
        {
            title: 'ç›¸å…³æ–‡æ¡£ 2',
            excerpt: 'è¿™æ˜¯å¦ä¸€æ®µç›¸å…³çš„æ–‡æ¡£æè¿°...',
            url: '#'
        }
    ];
}

function setupHotkeys() {
    document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
        // æŒ‰ ESC è¿”å›ä¸Šé¡µ
        if (e.key === 'Escape') {
            window.history.back();
        }

        // æŒ‰ Enter æ‰§è¡Œæœç´¢
        if (e.key === 'Enter' && document.activeElement.id === 'error-search-input') {
            const query = document.activeElement.value;
            if (query) {
                window.location.href = `${window.location.origin}/search.html?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
            }
        }
    });
}

// é˜²æŠ–å‡½æ•°
function debounce(fn, delay) {
    let timer = null;
    return function(...args) {
        clearTimeout(timer);
        timer = setTimeout(() => fn.apply(this, args), delay);
    };
}
</script>

    è¿™æ ·ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°±å®Œæˆäº†æ–‡ç« åº•éƒ¨ä¿¡æ¯å’Œ 404 é¡µé¢çš„æ¨¡æ¿ã€‚ä¸»è¦ç‰¹ç‚¹åŒ…æ‹¬ï¼š

    1. æ–‡ç« åº•éƒ¨ï¼š - æ¸…æ™°çš„ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ç« å¯¼èˆª - ç¤¾äº¤åˆ†äº«æŒ‰é’® - ç›¸å…³æ–‡ç« æ¨è - é›†æˆè¯„è®ºç³»ç»Ÿ

    2. 404 é¡µé¢ï¼š - å‹å¥½çš„é”™è¯¯æç¤º - å®æ—¶æœç´¢å»ºè®® - å¤šç§è¿”å›é€‰é¡¹ - é”®ç›˜å¿«æ·é”®æ”¯æŒ

    ä½¿ç”¨è¿™äº›æ¨¡æ¿æ—¶ï¼Œéœ€è¦åœ¨ mkdocs.yml ä¸­æ·»åŠ ç›¸åº”çš„é…ç½®ï¼š

    YAML

    - search.suggest
    - search.highlight

    provider: giscus

    category_id: your-category-id

    7.2 ä¿®æ”¹ç»„ä»¶æ¨¡æ¿ Â¶

        {% if config.theme.logo %}
        <img src="{{ config.theme.logo }}" alt="logo" class="nav-logo">
        {% endif %}

    </div>

    <!-- è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¯¼èˆªé¡¹ -->

        {% for nav_item in nav %}
        {% include "partials/nav-item.html" %}
        {% endfor %}

        <!-- æ·»åŠ è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¯¼èˆªé¡¹ -->

            <a href="{{ link.url }}" class="nav-link" {% if link.target %}target="{{ link.target }}"{% endif %}>
                {% if link.icon %}
                <span class="nav-icon">
                    {% include ".icons/" ~ link.icon ~ ".svg" %}
                </span>
                {% endif %}
                {{ link.title }}
            </a>

    7.2.3 æœç´¢æ¡† Â¶

    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/partials/search-modal.html -->
<div class="md-search-modal" data-md-component="search-modal">
    <div class="md-search-modal__overlay" data-md-component="search-modal-overlay"></div>

    <div class="md-search-modal__inner">
        <!-- æœç´¢å¤´éƒ¨ -->
        <header class="md-search-modal__header">
            <form class="md-search-modal__form">
                <input
                    type="text"
                    class="md-search-modal__input"
                    name="query"
                    placeholder="æœç´¢æ–‡æ¡£..."
                    data-md-component="search-query"
                    autocapitalize="off"
                    autocomplete="off"
                    autocorrect="off"
                    spellcheck="false"
                >
                <!-- å¿«æ·é”®æç¤º -->
                <div class="md-search-modal__shortcuts">
                    <kbd>â†‘</kbd><kbd>â†“</kbd> é€‰æ‹©
                    <kbd>â†µ</kbd> æ‰“å¼€
                    <kbd>ESC</kbd> å…³é—­
                </div>
            </form>
        </header>

        <!-- æœç´¢ç»“æœ -->
        <main class="md-search-modal__body">
            <div class="md-search-modal__scrollwrap">
                <div class="md-search-modal__meta">
                    é”®å…¥ä»¥å¼€å§‹æœç´¢
                </div>

                <div class="md-search-modal__results">
                    <!-- æœç´¢ç»“æœåˆ—è¡¨ -->
                    <div class="md-search-modal__list"></div>

                    <!-- æœç´¢å»ºè®® -->
                    <div class="md-search-modal__suggestions">
                        <h3>æ‚¨å¯èƒ½æ„Ÿå…´è¶£ï¼š</h3>
                        <div class="suggestions-list">
                            <!-- åŠ¨æ€ç”Ÿæˆçš„å»ºè®®åˆ—è¡¨ -->
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </main>
    </div>
</div>

    æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½è„šæœ¬ï¼š

    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/search.js
class SearchModal {
    constructor() {
        this.modal = document.querySelector('.md-search-modal');
        this.overlay = document.querySelector('.md-search-modal__overlay');
        this.input = document.querySelector('.md-search-modal__input');
        this.resultsList = document.querySelector('.md-search-modal__list');
        this.suggestions = document.querySelector('.md-search-modal__suggestions');

        this.searchIndex = null;
        this.searchResults = [];
        this.currentFocus = -1;

        this.init();
    }

    init() {
        // åˆå§‹åŒ–æœç´¢ç´¢å¼•
        this.buildSearchIndex();
        // ç»‘å®šäº‹ä»¶
        this.bindEvents();
        // è®¾ç½®å¿«æ·é”®
        this.setupShortcuts();
    }

    async buildSearchIndex() {
        // æ„å»ºæœç´¢ç´¢å¼•
        const response = await fetch('/search/search_index.json');
        const data = await response.json();

        // ä½¿ç”¨ lunr.js æ„å»ºç´¢å¼•
        this.searchIndex = lunr(function() {
            this.field('title', { boost: 10 });
            this.field('text');
            this.ref('location');

            data.docs.forEach(function(doc) {
                this.add(doc);
            }, this);
        });
    }

    bindEvents() {
        // æœç´¢æ¡†è¾“å…¥äº‹ä»¶
        this.input.addEventListener('input', debounce(() => {
            const query = this.input.value;
            if (query.length >= 2) {
                this.performSearch(query);
            } else {
                this.clearResults();
            }
        }, 200));

        // æœç´¢ç»“æœå¯¼èˆª
        this.input.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
            switch (e.key) {
                case 'ArrowUp':
                    e.preventDefault();
                    this.navigateResults('up');
                    break;
                case 'ArrowDown':
                    e.preventDefault();
                    this.navigateResults('down');
                    break;
                case 'Enter':
                    e.preventDefault();
                    this.openResult();
                    break;
                case 'Escape':
                    e.preventDefault();
                    this.closeModal();
                    break;
            }
        });

        // ç‚¹å‡»é®ç½©å…³é—­
        this.overlay.addEventListener('click', () => this.closeModal());
    }

    setupShortcuts() {
        // å…¨å±€æœç´¢å¿«æ·é”®
        document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
            // Ctrl/Cmd + K æ‰“å¼€æœç´¢
            if ((e.ctrlKey || e.metaKey) && e.key === 'k') {
                e.preventDefault();
                this.openModal();
            }
        });
    }

    async performSearch(query) {
        if (!this.searchIndex) return;

        // æ‰§è¡Œæœç´¢
        this.searchResults = this.searchIndex.search(query).map(result => {
            return {
                ref: result.ref,
                score: result.score,
                ...this.getDocumentByRef(result.ref)
            };
        });

        // æ¸²æŸ“ç»“æœ
        this.renderResults();
        // æ›´æ–°å»ºè®®
        this.updateSuggestions(query);
    }

    renderResults() {
        this.resultsList.innerHTML = this.searchResults
            .map((result, index) => `
                <div class="search-result-item ${index === this.currentFocus ? 'focused' : ''}"
                     data-index="${index}">
                    <div class="result-title">${this.highlightText(result.title)}</div>
                    <div class="result-excerpt">${this.highlightText(result.excerpt)}</div>
                    <div class="result-location">${result.location}</div>
                </div>
            `)
            .join('');
    }

    highlightText(text) {
        const query = this.input.value;
        if (!query) return text;

        const regex = new RegExp(`(${query})`, 'gi');
        return text.replace(regex, '<mark>$1</mark>');
    }

    updateSuggestions(query) {
        // æ ¹æ®æœç´¢å†å²å’Œçƒ­é—¨æœç´¢ç”Ÿæˆå»ºè®®
        const suggestions = this.generateSuggestions(query);

        this.suggestions.innerHTML = suggestions
            .map(suggestion => `
                <div class="suggestion-item" data-query="${suggestion.query}">
                    <span class="suggestion-icon">
                        ${suggestion.type === 'history' ? 'â±ï¸' : 'ğŸ”¥'}
                    </span>
                    ${suggestion.query}
                </div>
            `)
            .join('');
    }

    navigateResults(direction) {
        const maxIndex = this.searchResults.length - 1;

        if (direction === 'up') {
            this.currentFocus = this.currentFocus > 0 ? this.currentFocus - 1 : maxIndex;
        } else {
            this.currentFocus = this.currentFocus < maxIndex ? this.currentFocus + 1 : 0;
        }

        this.renderResults();
        this.scrollToFocused();
    }

    scrollToFocused() {
        const focused = this.resultsList.querySelector('.focused');
        if (focused) {
            focused.scrollIntoView({
                behavior: 'smooth',
                block: 'nearest'
            });
        }
    }

    openResult() {
        const result = this.searchResults[this.currentFocus];
        if (result) {
            window.location.href = result.location;
        }
    }

    openModal() {
        this.modal.classList.add('active');
        this.input.focus();
        document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }

    closeModal() {
        this.modal.classList.remove('active');
        this.input.value = '';
        this.clearResults();
        document.body.style.overflow = '';
    }

    clearResults() {
        this.searchResults = [];
        this.currentFocus = -1;
        this.resultsList.innerHTML = '';
        this.suggestions.innerHTML = '';
    }
}

// åˆå§‹åŒ–æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    new SearchModal();
});

    æœç´¢æ¡†æ ·å¼ï¼š

    CSS
    /* docs/stylesheets/search-modal.css */
.md-search-modal {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    z-index: 1000;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.md-search-modal.active {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
}

.md-search-modal__overlay {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
}

    7.2.4 ç›®å½• Â¶

    7.2.4.1 ç›®å½•ç»“æ„ Â¶
    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/partials/toc.html -->
<nav class="md-toc" aria-label="ç›®å½•">
    <div class="md-toc__header">
        <h2 class="md-toc__title">ç›®å½•</h2>
        <button class="md-toc__toggle" aria-label="å±•å¼€/æ”¶èµ·">
            {% include ".icons/material/chevron-down.svg" %}
        </button>
    </div>

    <div class="md-toc__inner">
        {% set toc = page.toc %}
        <ul class="md-toc__list">
            {% for toc_item in toc %}
                {% include "partials/toc-item.html" %}
            {% endfor %}
        </ul>
    </div>
</nav>

<!-- docs/overrides/partials/toc-item.html -->
<li class="md-toc__item">
    <a href="{{ toc_item.url }}" class="md-toc__link">
        {{ toc_item.title }}
    </a>

    {% if toc_item.children %}
    <ul class="md-toc__list">
        {% for toc_item in toc_item.children %}
            {% include "partials/toc-item.html" %}
        {% endfor %}
    </ul>
    {% endif %}
</li>
    7.2.4.2 æ»šåŠ¨åŒæ­¥ Â¶
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/toc.js
class TableOfContents {
    constructor() {
        this.toc = document.querySelector('.md-toc');
        this.tocLinks = this.toc.querySelectorAll('.md-toc__link');
        this.headings = document.querySelectorAll('h1[id], h2[id], h3[id], h4[id], h5[id], h6[id]');
        this.intersectionObserver = null;

        this.init();
    }

    init() {
        this.setupIntersectionObserver();
        this.setupScrollSpy();
        this.setupToggle();
    }

    setupIntersectionObserver() {
        this.intersectionObserver = new IntersectionObserver(
            (entries) => {
                entries.forEach(entry => {
                    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                        const id = entry.target.getAttribute('id');
                        this.highlightTocItem(id);
                    }
                });
            },
            {
                rootMargin: '0px 0px -80% 0px'
            }
        );

        this.headings.forEach(heading => {
            this.intersectionObserver.observe(heading);
        });
    }

    setupScrollSpy() {
        this.tocLinks.forEach(link => {
            link.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                e.preventDefault();
                const id = link.getAttribute('href').substring(1);
                const target = document.getElementById(id);

                if (target) {
                    window.scrollTo({
                        top: target.offsetTop - 100,
                        behavior: 'smooth'
                    });

                    // æ›´æ–° URL
                    history.pushState(null, null, `#${id}`);
                }
            });
        });
    }

    highlightTocItem(id) {
        // ç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰é«˜äº®
        this.tocLinks.forEach(link => {
            link.classList.remove('active');
        });

        // æ·»åŠ æ–°é«˜äº®
        const activeLink = this.toc.querySelector(`a[href="#${id}"]`);
        if (activeLink) {
            activeLink.classList.add('active');
            this.expandParents(activeLink);
        }
    }

    expandParents(element) {
        let parent = element.parentElement;
        while (parent && parent.classList.contains('md-toc__item')) {
            const list = parent.querySelector('.md-toc__list');
            if (list) {
                list.style.height = 'auto';
                parent.classList.add('expanded');
            }
            parent = parent.parentElement;
        }
    }
}
    7.2.4.3 å±•å¼€æ”¶èµ· Â¶
    JavaScript
    setupToggle() {
    const toggleButton = this.toc.querySelector('.md-toc__toggle');
    const tocInner = this.toc.querySelector('.md-toc__inner');

    toggleButton?.addEventListener('click', () => {
        const isExpanded = this.toc.classList.contains('expanded');

        if (isExpanded) {
            this.toc.classList.remove('expanded');
            tocInner.style.height = '0';
        } else {
            this.toc.classList.add('expanded');
            tocInner.style.height = tocInner.scrollHeight + 'px';
        }
    });

    // æ·»åŠ å±•å¼€/æ”¶èµ·æ‰€æœ‰æŒ‰é’®
    const expandAllButton = document.createElement('button');
    expandAllButton.className = 'md-toc__expand-all';
    expandAllButton.innerHTML = 'å±•å¼€å…¨éƒ¨';
    expandAllButton.addEventListener('click', () => this.toggleAll(true));

    const collapseAllButton = document.createElement('button');
    collapseAllButton.className = 'md-toc__collapse-all';
    collapseAllButton.innerHTML = 'æ”¶èµ·å…¨éƒ¨';
    collapseAllButton.addEventListener('click', () => this.toggleAll(false));

    const buttonGroup = document.createElement('div');
    buttonGroup.className = 'md-toc__button-group';
    buttonGroup.appendChild(expandAllButton);
    buttonGroup.appendChild(collapseAllButton);

    this.toc.querySelector('.md-toc__header').appendChild(buttonGroup);
}

toggleAll(expand) {
    const lists = this.toc.querySelectorAll('.md-toc__list');
    lists.forEach(list => {
        if (expand) {
            list.style.height = 'auto';
            list.parentElement.classList.add('expanded');
        } else {
            list.style.height = '0';
            list.parentElement.classList.remove('expanded');
        }
    });
}

    ç›®å½•æ ·å¼ï¼š

    CSS
    /* docs/stylesheets/toc.css */
.md-toc {

    font-size: 0.8rem;
}

    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;

}

}

    display: flex;

}

    padding: 0.2rem 0.5rem;
    font-size: 0.7rem;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color--light);
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    border: none;
    border-radius: 4px;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.md-toc__button-group button:hover {
    color: var(--md-accent-fg-color);
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color--light);
}

    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
}

    margin: 0.2rem 0;
}

    padding-left: 0.5rem;
}

    padding-left: 0.5rem;
}

    overflow: hidden;
    height: 0;

}

}

    background-size: contain;
    transform: rotate(0);
    transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.md-toc__item.expanded > .md-toc__link::before {
    transform: rotate(90deg);
}

}

}

    border-radius: 2px;
}

/* å“åº”å¼è®¾è®¡ */
@media screen and (max-width: 76.1875em) {
    .md-toc {
        position: fixed;

        right: -18rem;
        width: 18rem;
        height: 100vh;
        max-height: none;

        right: 0;
    }

        display: none;
        position: fixed;

}

/* å¹³æ¿é€‚é… */

    å®Œæ•´çš„ç›®å½•åŠŸèƒ½å®ç°ï¼š

    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/toc.js
class TableOfContents {
    constructor() {
        this.toc = document.querySelector('.md-toc');
        this.tocLinks = this.toc.querySelectorAll('.md-toc__link');
        this.headings = document.querySelectorAll('h1[id], h2[id], h3[id], h4[id], h5[id], h6[id]');
        this.intersectionObserver = null;
        this.isScrolling = false;
        this.scrollTimeout = null;

        this.init();
    }

    init() {
        this.setupIntersectionObserver();
        this.setupScrollSpy();
        this.setupToggle();
        this.setupMobileToggle();
        this.handleInitialHash();
    }

    handleInitialHash() {
        // å¤„ç†é¡µé¢åŠ è½½æ—¶çš„ hash
        if (window.location.hash) {
            const id = window.location.hash.substring(1);
            const target = document.getElementById(id);
            if (target) {
                setTimeout(() => {
                    target.scrollIntoView();
                    this.highlightTocItem(id);
                }, 100);
            }
        }
    }

    setupMobileToggle() {
        // åˆ›å»ºç§»åŠ¨ç«¯å¼€å…³æŒ‰é’®
        const toggleButton = document.createElement('button');
        toggleButton.className = 'md-toc-toggle';
        toggleButton.innerHTML = `
            <span class="md-toc-toggle__icon">
                {% include ".icons/material/menu.svg" %}
            </span>
        `;

        // åˆ›å»ºé®ç½©å±‚
        const overlay = document.createElement('div');
        overlay.className = 'md-toc-overlay';

        document.body.appendChild(toggleButton);
        document.body.appendChild(overlay);

        // ç»‘å®šäº‹ä»¶
        toggleButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
            this.toc.classList.toggle('expanded');
            document.body.style.overflow = this.toc.classList.contains('expanded') ? 'hidden' : '';
        });

        overlay.addEventListener('click', () => {
            this.toc.classList.remove('expanded');
            document.body.style.overflow = '';
        });
    }

    updateTocHeight() {
        const lists = this.toc.querySelectorAll('.md-toc__list');
        lists.forEach(list => {
            if (list.parentElement.classList.contains('expanded')) {
                list.style.height = list.scrollHeight + 'px';
            }
        });
    }

    onResize() {
        // ç›‘å¬çª—å£å¤§å°å˜åŒ–ï¼Œæ›´æ–°ç›®å½•é«˜åº¦
        window.addEventListener('resize', debounce(() => {
            this.updateTocHeight();
        }, 100));
    }
}

// å·¥å…·å‡½æ•°
function debounce(fn, delay) {
    let timer = null;
    return function(...args) {
        clearTimeout(timer);
        timer = setTimeout(() => fn.apply(this, args), delay);
    };
}

// åˆå§‹åŒ–ç›®å½•
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    new TableOfContents();
});

    ä½¿ç”¨è¿™äº›ä»£ç ï¼Œéœ€è¦åœ¨ mkdocs.yml ä¸­æ·»åŠ ç›¸åº”çš„é…ç½®ï¼š

    YAML
    theme:
  name: material
  custom_dir: docs/overrides
  features:
    - toc.integrate
    - toc.follow

extra_css:
  - stylesheets/toc.css

extra_javascript:
  - javascripts/toc.js

    è¿™æ ·å°±å®Œæˆäº†ä¸€ä¸ªåŠŸèƒ½å®Œæ•´ã€äº¤äº’å‹å¥½çš„ç›®å½•å¯¼èˆªç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œä¸»è¦ç‰¹ç‚¹åŒ…æ‹¬ï¼š

    1. è‡ªåŠ¨é«˜äº®å½“å‰é˜…è¯»ä½ç½®
    2. å¹³æ»‘æ»šåŠ¨åˆ°ç›®æ ‡ä½ç½®
    3. æ”¯æŒå±•å¼€ / æ”¶èµ·åŠŸèƒ½
    4. ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯è‡ªé€‚åº”å¸ƒå±€
    5. ä¼˜é›…çš„åŠ¨ç”»æ•ˆæœ
    6. è‰¯å¥½çš„å¯è®¿é—®æ€§æ”¯æŒ
    7. æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–è€ƒè™‘

    8 æ’ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨ Â¶

    8.1 å¿…å¤‡æ’ä»¶ Â¶

    8.1.1.1 searchÂ¶
    8.1.1.2 åŸºç¡€é…ç½® Â¶
    1. å®‰è£…æœç´¢æ’ä»¶ï¼š
    Bash
    pip install mkdocs-material
    1. é…ç½®æœç´¢ï¼š
    YAML
    # mkdocs.yml
plugins:
  - search:
      # æœç´¢ç´¢å¼•è®¾ç½®
      lang: 
        - en
        - zh
      separator: '[\s\-\.]+'    # åˆ†è¯åˆ†éš”ç¬¦
      min_search_length: 2      # æœ€å°æœç´¢é•¿åº¦
      prebuild_index: true      # é¢„æ„å»ºç´¢å¼•

      # æœç´¢å†…å®¹é…ç½®
      indexing:
        full_sections: true     # ç´¢å¼•å®Œæ•´ç« èŠ‚
        headings: true         # ç´¢å¼•æ ‡é¢˜
        content: true         # ç´¢å¼•å†…å®¹
        tags: true           # ç´¢å¼•æ ‡ç­¾

      # æœç´¢ç»“æœæ’åº
      scoring:
        title_boost: 10      # æ ‡é¢˜æƒé‡
        heading_boost: 5     # æ ‡é¢˜æƒé‡
        content_boost: 1     # å†…å®¹æƒé‡
    1. æœç´¢ä¸»é¢˜é…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    theme:
  features:
    - search.highlight        # æœç´¢é«˜äº®
    - search.share           # æœç´¢åˆ†äº«
    - search.suggest         # æœç´¢å»ºè®®

  # æœç´¢ç•Œé¢æ–‡å­—
  language: zh
  palette:
    - search:
        placeholder: æœç´¢æ–‡æ¡£
        result:
          no_results_text: æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ç›¸å…³ç»“æœ
          searching_text: æ­£åœ¨æœç´¢...
    8.1.1.3 ä¸­æ–‡æœç´¢ Â¶
    1. ä¸­æ–‡åˆ†è¯é…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    plugins:
  - search:
      jieba_dict: dict.txt   # è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¯å…¸è·¯å¾„
      jieba_dict_user: user_dict.txt  # ç”¨æˆ·è¯å…¸è·¯å¾„

      # ä¸­æ–‡åˆ†è¯è§„åˆ™
      separator: '[ï¼Œã€‚ï¼ï¼Ÿ,!?]+'

      # ä¸­æ–‡åœç”¨è¯
      stopwords:
        - çš„
        - äº†
        - å’Œ
        - æ˜¯
        - å°±
        - éƒ½
        - è€Œ
        - åŠ
        - ä¸
        - è¿™
    1. è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¯å…¸ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼ˆdict.txtï¼‰ï¼š
    Text Only
    æŠ€æœ¯æ–‡æ¡£ 5
å¼€å‘æŒ‡å— 5
æœ€ä½³å®è·µ 5
ä½¿ç”¨æ•™ç¨‹ 5
é…ç½®è¯´æ˜ 5
å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜ 5
    1. åˆ†è¯ä¼˜åŒ–è„šæœ¬ï¼š
    Python
    # docs/search_optimize.py
import jieba
import json
from pathlib import Path

def optimize_search_index(index_file, dict_file):
    # åŠ è½½è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¯å…¸
    jieba.load_userdict(dict_file)

    # è¯»å–æœç´¢ç´¢å¼•
    with open(index_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
        index = json.load(f)

    # ä¼˜åŒ–åˆ†è¯
    for doc in index['docs']:
        # åˆ†è¯å¤„ç†æ ‡é¢˜
        title_words = list(jieba.cut(doc['title']))
        doc['title'] = ' '.join(title_words)

        # åˆ†è¯å¤„ç†å†…å®¹
        if 'text' in doc:
            text_words = list(jieba.cut(doc['text']))
            doc['text'] = ' '.join(text_words)

    # ä¿å­˜ä¼˜åŒ–åçš„ç´¢å¼•
    with open(index_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
        json.dump(index, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    index_file = 'site/search/search_index.json'
    dict_file = 'docs/dict.txt'
    optimize_search_index(index_file, dict_file)
    8.1.1.4 æœç´¢ä¼˜åŒ– Â¶
    1. ç´¢å¼•ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼š
    Python
    # docs/search_index_optimizer.py
from pathlib import Path
import json
import re

class SearchIndexOptimizer:
    def __init__(self, index_path):
        self.index_path = Path(index_path)
        self.index = self.load_index()

    def load_index(self):
        with open(self.index_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
            return json.load(f)

    def save_index(self):
        with open(self.index_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
            json.dump(self.index, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)

    def optimize(self):
        # æ¸…ç†æ— ç”¨æ•°æ®
        self._clean_data()
        # ä¼˜åŒ–æ–‡æœ¬
        self._optimize_text()
        # æ·»åŠ æƒé‡
        self._add_weights()
        # æ„å»ºåå‘ç´¢å¼•
        self._build_inverted_index()
        # ä¿å­˜ä¼˜åŒ–åçš„ç´¢å¼•
        self.save_index()

    def _clean_data(self):
        # ç§»é™¤ç©ºæ–‡æ¡£
        self.index['docs'] = [
            doc for doc in self.index['docs']
            if doc.get('text') or doc.get('title')
        ]

        # ç§»é™¤é‡å¤æ–‡æ¡£
        seen = set()
        unique_docs = []
        for doc in self.index['docs']:
            key = f"{doc['location']}:{doc['title']}"
            if key not in seen:
                seen.add(key)
                unique_docs.append(doc)
        self.index['docs'] = unique_docs

    def _optimize_text(self):
        for doc in self.index['docs']:
            # æ¸…ç†HTMLæ ‡ç­¾
            if 'text' in doc:
                doc['text'] = re.sub(r'<[^>]+>', '', doc['text'])

            # å‹ç¼©ç©ºç™½å­—ç¬¦
            for field in ['title', 'text']:
                if field in doc:
                    doc[field] = ' '.join(doc[field].split())

    def _add_weights(self):
        for doc in self.index['docs']:
            # åŸºç¡€æƒé‡
            doc['weight'] = 1.0

            # æ ‡é¢˜é•¿åº¦æƒé‡
            if 'title' in doc:
                title_len = len(doc['title'])
                doc['weight'] *= 1 + (1.0 / (1 + title_len))

            # æ–‡æœ¬é•¿åº¦æƒé‡
            if 'text' in doc:
                text_len = len(doc['text'])
                doc['weight'] *= 1 + (100.0 / (1 + text_len))

            # URLæ·±åº¦æƒé‡
            depth = doc['location'].count('/')
            doc['weight'] *= 1 + (1.0 / (1 + depth))

    def _build_inverted_index(self):
        # æ„å»ºåå‘ç´¢å¼•
        inverted_index = {}
        for i, doc in enumerate(self.index['docs']):
            terms = set()

            # æ·»åŠ æ ‡é¢˜è¯
            if 'title' in doc:
                terms.update(doc['title'].lower().split())

            # æ·»åŠ æ–‡æœ¬è¯
            if 'text' in doc:
                terms.update(doc['text'].lower().split())

            # æ›´æ–°åå‘ç´¢å¼•
            for term in terms:
                if term not in inverted_index:
                    inverted_index[term] = []
                inverted_index[term].append({
                    'id': i,
                    'weight': doc['weight']
                })

        self.index['inverted_index'] = inverted_index

# ä½¿ç”¨ä¼˜åŒ–å™¨
optimizer = SearchIndexOptimizer('site/search/search_index.json')
optimizer.optimize()
    1. æœç´¢æ€§èƒ½ç›‘æ§ï¼š
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/search-monitor.js
class SearchMonitor {
    constructor() {
        this.metrics = {
            searches: 0,
            avgTime: 0,
            slowest: 0,
            fastest: Infinity
        };

        this.init();
    }

    init() {
        this.monitorSearchInput();
        this.monitorSearchResults();
        this.setupReporting();
    }

    monitorSearchInput() {
        const searchInput = document.querySelector('.md-search__input');
        let startTime;

        searchInput?.addEventListener('input', () => {
            startTime = performance.now();
        });

        searchInput?.addEventListener('search', () => {
            const endTime = performance.now();
            const duration = endTime - startTime;

            this.updateMetrics(duration);
        });
    }

    updateMetrics(duration) {
        this.metrics.searches++;
        this.metrics.avgTime = (
            (this.metrics.avgTime * (this.metrics.searches - 1) + duration) /
            this.metrics.searches
        );
        this.metrics.slowest = Math.max(this.metrics.slowest, duration);
        this.metrics.fastest = Math.min(this.metrics.fastest, duration);

        // å‘é€ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®
        this.sendMetrics();
    }

    sendMetrics() {
        // å¯ä»¥å‘é€åˆ°ç»Ÿè®¡æœåŠ¡
        console.log('Search Metrics:', this.metrics);
    }
}

// åˆå§‹åŒ–ç›‘æ§
new SearchMonitor();

    8.1.2 glightboxÂ¶

    8.1.2.1 å›¾ç‰‡é¢„è§ˆ Â¶
    1. å®‰è£…æ’ä»¶ï¼š
    Bash
    pip install mkdocs-glightbox
    1. åŸºç¡€é…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    # mkdocs.yml
plugins:
  - glightbox:
      # åŸºç¡€è®¾ç½®
      auto_caption: true              # è‡ªåŠ¨æ·»åŠ æ ‡é¢˜
      caption_position: bottom        # æ ‡é¢˜ä½ç½®
      display_description: true       # æ˜¾ç¤ºæè¿°

      # è§¦æ‘¸è®¾ç½®
      touchNavigation: true          # è§¦æ‘¸å¯¼èˆª
      loop: true                    # å¾ªç¯æµè§ˆ
      effect: zoom                  # è¿‡æ¸¡æ•ˆæœ

      # å›¾ç‰‡è®¾ç½®
      width: 100%                   # å›¾ç‰‡å®½åº¦
      height: auto                  # å›¾ç‰‡é«˜åº¦
      zoomable: true               # å¯ç”¨ç¼©æ”¾
      draggable: true              # å¯ç”¨æ‹–åŠ¨
    1. è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ ·å¼ï¼š

    /* docs/stylesheets/glightbox.css */
.glightbox-clean {
    /* å®¹å™¨æ ·å¼ */

    --glow-bg: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);

    /* æ§åˆ¶æŒ‰é’® */

    /* åŠ è½½åŠ¨ç”» */

    --glow-loading-width: 40px;
    --glow-loading-height: 40px;

    font-size: 0.9rem;
    padding: 1rem;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
