    margin-top: 0.5rem;
}

/* åŠ è½½åŠ¨ç”» */
.glightbox-loading {
    border: 3px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
    border-top-color: #fff;
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: glow-spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes glow-spin {
    to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}
    8.1.2.2 ç”»å»Šæ¨¡å¼ Â¶
    1. ç”»å»Šé…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    plugins:
  - glightbox:
      # ç”»å»Šè®¾ç½®
      gallery: true                 # å¯ç”¨ç”»å»Š
      gallery_mode: true           # ç”»å»Šæ¨¡å¼
      gallery_trigger: click      # è§¦å‘æ–¹å¼

      # ç¼©ç•¥å›¾è®¾ç½®
      thumb_width: 150            # ç¼©ç•¥å›¾å®½åº¦
      thumb_height: 100           # ç¼©ç•¥å›¾é«˜åº¦
      thumb_fit: cover            # ç¼©ç•¥å›¾é€‚åº”æ–¹å¼
    1. ç”»å»Šå®ç°ï¼š
    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/gallery.html -->
<div class="gallery">
    {% for image in page.meta.gallery %}
    <a href="{{ image.url }}" 
       class="gallery-item"
       data-gallery="gallery"
       data-glightbox="title: {{ image.title }}; description: {{ image.description }}">
        <img src="{{ image.thumbnail or image.url }}" 
             alt="{{ image.title }}"
             loading="lazy">
        {% if image.title %}
        <div class="gallery-caption">{{ image.title }}</div>
        {% endif %}
    </a>
    {% endfor %}
</div>
    1. ç”»å»Šæ ·å¼ï¼š
    CSS
    /* docs/stylesheets/gallery.css */
.gallery {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(150px, 1fr));
    gap: 1rem;
    padding: 1rem;
}

.gallery-item {
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
    border-radius: 4px;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.gallery-item:hover {
    transform: translateY(-4px);
}

.gallery-item img {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.gallery-item:hover img {
    transform: scale(1.1);
}

.gallery-caption {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    padding: 0.5rem;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
    color: white;
    font-size: 0.8rem;
    transform: translateY(100%);
    transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.gallery-item:hover .gallery-caption {
    transform: translateY(0);
}

    8.2 æ¨èæ’ä»¶ Â¶

    8.2.1.1 git-revision-dateÂ¶
    8.2.1.2 æ—¶é—´æ˜¾ç¤º Â¶
    1. å®‰è£…æ’ä»¶ï¼š
    Bash
    pip install mkdocs-git-revision-date-localized-plugin
    1. åŸºç¡€é…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    # mkdocs.yml
plugins:
  - git-revision-date-localized:
      enabled: true
      type: date           # æ˜¾ç¤ºç±»å‹ï¼šdate, datetime, iso_date, iso_datetime, timeago
      timezone: Asia/Shanghai  # æ—¶åŒºè®¾ç½®
      locale: zh          # æœ¬åœ°åŒ–è¯­è¨€
      fallback_to_build_date: true  # æ—  git ä¿¡æ¯æ—¶ä½¿ç”¨æ„å»ºæ—¶é—´

      # æ—¶é—´æ ¼å¼
      enable_creation_date: true    # æ˜¾ç¤ºåˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´
      exclude:
        - index.md
        - 404.md
    1. æ—¶é—´æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¨¡æ¿ï¼š
    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/partials/date.html -->
{% if page.meta.git_revision_date_localized %}
<div class="page-date">
    <!-- æœ€åæ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´ -->
    <div class="date-item">
        <span class="date-icon">
            {% include ".icons/material/update.svg" %}
        </span>
        <span class="date-text">
            æœ€åæ›´æ–°: {{ page.meta.git_revision_date_localized }}
        </span>
    </div>

    <!-- åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´ -->
    {% if page.meta.git_creation_date_localized %}
    <div class="date-item">
        <span class="date-icon">
            {% include ".icons/material/clock-outline.svg" %}
        </span>
        <span class="date-text">
            åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´: {{ page.meta.git_creation_date_localized }}
        </span>
    </div>
    {% endif %}
</div>
    8.2.1.3 æ›´æ–°è®°å½• Â¶

    flex: 0 0 200px;

    flex: 1;

    position: relative;
    padding-left: 2rem;
}

    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 1rem;
    width: 12px;
    height: 12px;
    background: var(--md-accent-fg-color);
    border-radius: 50%;
}

    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    left: 5px;
    top: 1.5rem;
    bottom: -0.5rem;
    width: 2px;
    background: var(--md-default-fg-color--lightest);
}

.revision-item:last-child::after {
    display: none;
}
    8.2.1.4 ä½œè€…ä¿¡æ¯ Â¶

    1. ä½œè€…é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ (authors. yaml)ï¼š

    authors:

    name: John Doe

    bio: èµ„æ·±æŠ€æœ¯ä½œè€…
    social:
      github: johndoe
      twitter: johndoe

    name: Jane Smith
    email: jane@example.com
    avatar: assets/authors/jane.jpg

                {{ author.name[0] }}
            </div>
            {% endif %}

            {% endif %}

                   target="_blank"

    8.2.2 minifyÂ¶

    8.2.2.1 HTML å‹ç¼© Â¶
    1. å®‰è£…æ’ä»¶ï¼š
    Bash
    pip install mkdocs-minify-plugin
    1. é…ç½®å‹ç¼©ï¼š
    YAML
    # mkdocs.yml
plugins:
  - minify:
      minify_html: true
      htmlmin_opts:
          # HTMLå‹ç¼©é€‰é¡¹
          remove_comments: true  # ç§»é™¤æ³¨é‡Š
          remove_empty_space: true  # ç§»é™¤ç©ºç™½
          remove_all_empty_space: true  # ç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰ç©ºç™½
          reduce_boolean_attributes: true  # ç®€åŒ–å¸ƒå°”å±æ€§
          remove_optional_tags: false  # ä¿ç•™å¯é€‰æ ‡ç­¾
          remove_redundant_attributes: true  # ç§»é™¤å†—ä½™å±æ€§
          minify_js: true  # å‹ç¼©å†…è”JS
          minify_css: true  # å‹ç¼©å†…è”CSS
    8.2.2.2 CSS å‹ç¼© Â¶
    1. CSS å‹ç¼©é…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    plugins:
  - minify:
      minify_css: true
      css_files:
          - stylesheets/extra.css
          - stylesheets/custom.css
      cssmin_opts:
          # CSSå‹ç¼©é€‰é¡¹
          level: 2  # å‹ç¼©çº§åˆ«(1-2)
          compatibility: ie9  # å…¼å®¹æ€§
          format: beautify  # æ ¼å¼åŒ–è¾“å‡º
    1. CSS ä¼˜åŒ–è„šæœ¬ï¼š
    Python
    # docs/tools/css_optimizer.py
import re
from pathlib import Path
from csscompressor import compress

class CSSOptimizer:
    def __init__(self, input_dir, output_dir):
        self.input_dir = Path(input_dir)
        self.output_dir = Path(output_dir)
        self.output_dir.mkdir(exist_ok=True)

    def optimize(self):
        """ä¼˜åŒ–æ‰€æœ‰CSSæ–‡ä»¶"""
        for css_file in self.input_dir.glob('**/*.css'):
            # è¯»å–CSSå†…å®¹
            content = css_file.read_text(encoding='utf-8')

            # ä¼˜åŒ–CSS
            optimized = self.optimize_css(content)

            # ä¿å­˜ä¼˜åŒ–åçš„æ–‡ä»¶
            output_file = self.output_dir / css_file.name
            output_file.write_text(optimized, encoding='utf-8')

    def optimize_css(self, content):
        """ä¼˜åŒ–å•ä¸ªCSSæ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹"""
        # ç§»é™¤æ³¨é‡Š
        content = re.sub(r'/\*[\s\S]*?\*/', '', content)

        # ç§»é™¤å¤šä½™ç©ºç™½
        content = re.sub(r'\s+', ' ', content)

        # å‹ç¼©CSS
        content = compress(content)

        return content

# ä½¿ç”¨ä¼˜åŒ–å™¨
optimizer = CSSOptimizer(
    input_dir='docs/stylesheets',
    output_dir='docs/stylesheets/min'
)
optimizer.optimize()
    8.2.2.3 JS å‹ç¼© Â¶
    1. JS å‹ç¼©é…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    plugins:
  - minify:
      minify_js: true
      js_files:
          - javascripts/extra.js
          - javascripts/custom.js
      jsmin_opts:
          # JSå‹ç¼©é€‰é¡¹
          mangle: true  # æ··æ·†å˜é‡å
          compress: true  # å‹ç¼©ä»£ç 
          output:
              beautify: false  # ä¸ç¾åŒ–è¾“å‡º
    1. JS ä¼˜åŒ–è„šæœ¬ï¼š
    Python
    # docs/tools/js_optimizer.py
import re
from pathlib import Path
import terser

class JSOptimizer:
    def __init__(self, input_dir, output_dir):
        self.input_dir = Path(input_dir)
        self.output_dir = Path(output_dir)
        self.output_dir.mkdir(exist_ok=True)

    def optimize(self):
        """ä¼˜åŒ–æ‰€æœ‰JSæ–‡ä»¶"""
        for js_file in self.input_dir.glob('**/*.js'):
            # è¯»å–JSå†…å®¹
            content = js_file.read_text(encoding='utf-8')

            # ä¼˜åŒ–JS
            optimized = self.optimize_js(content)

            # ä¿å­˜ä¼˜åŒ–åçš„æ–‡ä»¶
            output_file = self.output_dir / js_file.name
            output_file.write_text(optimized, encoding='utf-8')

    def optimize_js(self, content):
        """ä¼˜åŒ–å•ä¸ªJSæ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹"""
        options = {
            'compress': {
                'pure_funcs': ['console.log'],  # ç§»é™¤console.log
                'drop_debugger': True,          # ç§»é™¤debugger
                'unsafe': True,                 # å¯ç”¨ä¸å®‰å…¨ä¼˜åŒ–
                'passes': 2                     # ä¼˜åŒ–æ¬¡æ•°
            },
            'mangle': {
                'toplevel': True,              # æ··æ·†é¡¶çº§ä½œç”¨åŸŸ
                'eval': True                   # æ··æ·†evalä¸­çš„å˜é‡
            }
        }

        # ä½¿ç”¨terserå‹ç¼©
        result = terser.minify(content, options)
        return result['code']

# ä½¿ç”¨ä¼˜åŒ–å™¨
optimizer = JSOptimizer(
    input_dir='docs/javascripts',
    output_dir='docs/javascripts/min'
)
optimizer.optimize()

    è¿™äº›é…ç½®å’Œè„šæœ¬å¯ä»¥æœ‰æ•ˆå‡å°ç«™ç‚¹èµ„æºå¤§å°ï¼Œæå‡åŠ è½½é€Ÿåº¦ã€‚è®°å¾—åœ¨ç”Ÿäº§ç¯å¢ƒä¸­ä½¿ç”¨å‹ç¼©åçš„èµ„æºã€‚

    8.2.3 socialÂ¶

    8.2.3.1 ç¤¾äº¤é“¾æ¥ Â¶
    1. å®‰è£…æ’ä»¶ï¼š
    Bash
    pip install mkdocs-social-plugin
    1. åŸºç¡€é…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    # mkdocs.yml
plugins:
  - social:
      enabled: true
      # ç¤¾äº¤å¹³å°é…ç½®
      cards: true           # å¯ç”¨ç¤¾äº¤å¡ç‰‡
      cards_color:          # å¡ç‰‡é¢œè‰²
          fill: "#0FF1CE"   # èƒŒæ™¯è‰²
          text: "#FFFFFF"   # æ–‡å­—è‰²
      cards_font: Roboto    # å¡ç‰‡å­—ä½“

extra:
  social:
    - icon: material/github
      link: https://github.com/username
      name: GitHub
    - icon: material/twitter
      link: https://twitter.com/username
      name: Twitter
    - icon: material/linkedin
      link: https://linkedin.com/in/username
      name: LinkedIn
    1. ç¤¾äº¤é“¾æ¥æ¨¡æ¿ï¼š
    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/partials/social.html -->
{% if config.extra.social %}
<div class="social-links">
    {% for social in config.extra.social %}
    <a href="{{ social.link }}" 
       target="_blank"
       rel="noopener"
       title="{{ social.name }}"
       class="social-link">
        <span class="social-icon">
            {% include ".icons/" ~ social.icon ~ ".svg" %}
        </span>
        <span class="social-name">{{ social.name }}</span>
    </a>
    {% endfor %}
</div>
{% endif %}

    æ ·å¼é…ç½®ï¼š

    CSS
    /* docs/stylesheets/social.css */
.social-links {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1rem;
    margin: 2rem 0;
}

.social-link {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color);
    text-decoration: none;
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    border-radius: 2rem;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.social-link:hover {
    transform: translateY(-2px);
    color: var(--md-accent-fg-color);
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color--light);
}

.social-icon {
    margin-right: 0.5rem;
    width: 1.2rem;
    height: 1.2rem;
}

.social-name {
    font-size: 0.9rem;
}

/* åŠ¨ç”»æ•ˆæœ */
.social-link .social-icon {
    transition: transform 0.2s ease;
}

.social-link:hover .social-icon {
    transform: scale(1.2);
}
    8.2.3.2 åˆ†äº«åŠŸèƒ½ Â¶
    1. åˆ†äº«åŠŸèƒ½é…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    # mkdocs.yml
extra:
  social_share:
    - platform: twitter
      text: åˆ†äº«åˆ° Twitter
      icon: material/twitter
    - platform: facebook
      text: åˆ†äº«åˆ° Facebook
      icon: material/facebook
    - platform: linkedin
      text: åˆ†äº«åˆ° LinkedIn
      icon: material/linkedin
    - platform: weibo
      text: åˆ†äº«åˆ°å¾®åš
      icon: material/sina-weibo
    1. åˆ†äº«åŠŸèƒ½å®ç°ï¼š
    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/partials/share.html -->
<div class="page-share">
    <h4>åˆ†äº«æ–‡ç« </h4>
    <div class="share-buttons">
        {% for share in config.extra.social_share %}
        <button class="share-button" 
                data-platform="{{ share.platform }}"
                onclick="shareContent('{{ share.platform }}')">
            <span class="share-icon">
                {% include ".icons/" ~ share.icon ~ ".svg" %}
            </span>
            <span class="share-text">{{ share.text }}</span>
        </button>
        {% endfor %}
    </div>
</div>

<script>
function shareContent(platform) {
    const url = encodeURIComponent(window.location.href);
    const title = encodeURIComponent(document.title);
    const text = encodeURIComponent(document.querySelector('meta[name="description"]')?.content || '');

    let shareUrl;
    switch(platform) {
        case 'twitter':
            shareUrl = `https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=${url}&text=${title}`;
            break;
        case 'facebook':
            shareUrl = `https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=${url}`;
            break;
        case 'linkedin':
            shareUrl = `https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=${url}`;
            break;
        case 'weibo':
            shareUrl = `http://service.weibo.com/share/share.php?url=${url}&title=${title}`;
            break;
    }

    window.open(shareUrl, '_blank', 'width=600,height=400');
}
</script>
    1. åˆ†äº«æ ·å¼ï¼š
    CSS
    /* docs/stylesheets/share.css */
.page-share {
    margin: 2rem 0;
    padding: 1rem;
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    border-radius: 8px;
}

.share-buttons {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    margin-top: 1rem;
}

.share-button {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 2rem;
    background: var(--md-default-bg-color);
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color);
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.share-button:hover {
    background: var(--md-accent-fg-color);
    color: white;
}

.share-icon {
    margin-right: 0.5rem;
    width: 1.2rem;
    height: 1.2rem;
}
    8.2.3.3 å…³æ³¨æŒ‰é’® Â¶
    1. å…³æ³¨æŒ‰é’®é…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    extra:
  follow_buttons:
    - platform: github
      username: your-username
      icon: material/github
      text: å…³æ³¨æˆ‘çš„ GitHub
    - platform: twitter
      username: your-username
      icon: material/twitter
      text: å…³æ³¨æˆ‘çš„ Twitter
    1. å…³æ³¨æŒ‰é’®å®ç°ï¼š
    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/partials/follow.html -->
<div class="follow-buttons">
    {% for btn in config.extra.follow_buttons %}
    <a href="https://{{ btn.platform }}.com/{{ btn.username }}"
       target="_blank"
       class="follow-button"
       data-platform="{{ btn.platform }}">
        <span class="follow-icon">
            {% include ".icons/" ~ btn.icon ~ ".svg" %}
        </span>
        <span class="follow-text">{{ btn.text }}</span>
        <span class="follow-count" id="{{ btn.platform }}-count">
            <!-- å°†é€šè¿‡APIåŠ¨æ€æ›´æ–° -->
        </span>
    </a>
    {% endfor %}
</div>

<script>
async function updateFollowCounts() {
    const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.follow-button');

    for (const button of buttons) {
        const platform = button.dataset.platform;
        const username = button.href.split('/').pop();

        // è·å–å…³æ³¨æ•°
        const count = await getFollowCount(platform, username);

        // æ›´æ–°æ˜¾ç¤º
        const countElement = button.querySelector('.follow-count');
        if (countElement && count) {
            countElement.textContent = formatCount(count);
        }
    }
}

async function getFollowCount(platform, username) {
    switch (platform) {
        case 'github':
            const response = await fetch(`https://api.github.com/users/${username}`);
            const data = await response.json();
            return data.followers;

        // å…¶ä»–å¹³å°APIå®ç°...
        default:
            return null;
    }
}

function formatCount(count) {
    if (count >= 1000000) {
        return (count / 1000000).toFixed(1) + 'M';
    }
    if (count >= 1000) {
        return (count / 1000).toFixed(1) + 'K';
    }
    return count.toString();
}

// åˆå§‹åŒ–
updateFollowCounts();
</script>
    1. å…³æ³¨æŒ‰é’®æ ·å¼ï¼š
    CSS
    /* docs/stylesheets/follow.css */
.follow-buttons {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 1rem;
    margin: 2rem 0;
}

.follow-button {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    text-decoration: none;
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    border-radius: 2rem;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.follow-button:hover {
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* å¹³å°ç‰¹å®šæ ·å¼ */

    color: #333;
}

    background: #333;
    color: white;
}

    color: #1DA1F2;

    background: #1DA1F2;
    color: white;

    width: 1.2rem;
    height: 1.2rem;

    padding: 0.2rem 0.5rem;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    border-radius: 1rem;
    font-size: 0.8rem;
}

    8.2.4 tagsÂ¶

    8.2.4.1 æ ‡ç­¾ç³»ç»Ÿ Â¶
    1. å®‰è£…æ’ä»¶ï¼š
    Bash
    pip install mkdocs-tags-plugin
    1. é…ç½®æ ‡ç­¾ï¼š
    YAML
    # mkdocs.yml
plugins:
  - tags:
      tags_file: tags.md
      tags_allowed:  # å…è®¸çš„æ ‡ç­¾åˆ—è¡¨
        - Python
        - JavaScript
        - CSS
        - HTML
      tags_extra_files:
        cloud: tag_cloud.md    # æ ‡ç­¾äº‘é¡µé¢
        list: tag_list.md      # æ ‡ç­¾åˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢
    1. åœ¨æ–‡æ¡£ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨æ ‡ç­¾ï¼š
    Markdown
    ---
tags:
  - Python
  - æ•™ç¨‹
---

# Python å…¥é—¨æ•™ç¨‹
    1. æ ‡ç­¾æ˜¾ç¤ºç»„ä»¶ï¼š
    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/partials/tags.html -->
{% if page.meta.tags %}
<div class="page-tags">
    {% for tag in page.meta.tags %}
    <a href="{{ base_url }}/tags/#{{ tag|lower }}" class="tag">
        <span class="tag-icon">
            {% include ".icons/material/tag.svg" %}
        </span>
        <span class="tag-text">{{ tag }}</span>
    </a>
    {% endfor %}
</div>
{% endif %}
    8.2.4.2 æ ‡ç­¾äº‘ Â¶
    1. æ ‡ç­¾äº‘å®ç°ï¼š
    Python
    # docs/plugins/tags/cloud.py
from collections import Counter
import math

class TagCloud:
    def __init__(self, tags):
        self.tags = Counter(tags)
        self.min_size = 0.8
        self.max_size = 2.0

    def get_tag_sizes(self):
        """è®¡ç®—æ ‡ç­¾å¤§å°"""
        if not self.tags:
            return {}

        # è·å–æœ€å¤§å’Œæœ€å°é¢‘ç‡
        max_freq = max(self.tags.values())
        min_freq = min(self.tags.values())

        # è®¡ç®—æ¯ä¸ªæ ‡ç­¾çš„å¤§å°
        sizes = {}
        for tag, freq in self.tags.items():
            if max_freq == min_freq:
                sizes[tag] = (self.max_size + self.min_size) / 2
            else:
                size = self.min_size + (self.max_size - self.min_size) * \
                       ((freq - min_freq) / (max_freq - min_freq))
                sizes[tag] = round(size, 2)

        return sizes

def generate_tag_cloud(tags):
    """ç”Ÿæˆæ ‡ç­¾äº‘HTML"""
    cloud = TagCloud(tags)
    sizes = cloud.get_tag_sizes()

    html = ['<div class="tag-cloud">']

    for tag, size in sizes.items():
        html.append(f'''
            <a href="#tag-{tag.lower()}" 
               class="tag-cloud-item"
               style="font-size: {size}rem">
                {tag}
            </a>
        ''')

    html.append('</div>')
    return '\n'.join(html)
    1. æ ‡ç­¾äº‘æ ·å¼ï¼š
    CSS
    /* docs/stylesheets/tags.css */
.tag-cloud {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 1rem;
    padding: 2rem;
}

.tag-cloud-item {
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color);
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    border-radius: 2rem;
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.tag-cloud-item:hover {
    transform: scale(1.1);
    background: var(--md-accent-fg-color);
    color: white;
}
    8.2.4.3 æ ‡ç­¾é¡µé¢ Â¶
    1. æ ‡ç­¾åˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢ï¼š
    Markdown
    # æ ‡ç­¾ç´¢å¼•

## æ ‡ç­¾äº‘
[TAGS_CLOUD]

## æ ‡ç­¾åˆ—è¡¨
[TAGS_LIST]
    1. æ ‡ç­¾é¡µé¢ç”Ÿæˆå™¨ï¼š
    Python
    # docs/plugins/tags/generator.py
from pathlib import Path
import yaml

class TagPageGenerator:
    def __init__(self, config):
        self.config = config
        self.tags = {}

    def collect_tags(self):
        """æ”¶é›†æ‰€æœ‰æ ‡ç­¾"""
        docs_dir = Path(self.config['docs_dir'])

        for md_file in docs_dir.glob('**/*.md'):
            # è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶frontmatter
            content = md_file.read_text(encoding='utf-8')
            if content.startswith('---'):
                try:
                    # è§£æfrontmatter
                    _, frontmatter, _ = content.split('---', 2)
                    meta = yaml.safe_load(frontmatter)

                    if 'tags' in meta:
                        # è·å–ç›¸å¯¹è·¯å¾„
                        rel_path = md_file.relative_to(docs_dir)
                        url = str(rel_path).replace('\\', '/')[:-3]  # ç§»é™¤.md

                        # æ·»åŠ åˆ°æ ‡ç­¾ç´¢å¼•
                        for tag in meta['tags']:
                            if tag not in self.tags:
                                self.tags[tag] = []
                            self.tags[tag].append({
                                'title': meta.get('title', url),
                                'url': url,
                                'description': meta.get('description', '')
                            })
                except:
                    continue

    def generate_tag_pages(self):
        """ç”Ÿæˆæ ‡ç­¾ç›¸å…³é¡µé¢"""
        self.collect_tags()

        # ç”Ÿæˆæ ‡ç­¾åˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢
        if 'list' in self.config['tags_extra_files']:
            self.generate_list_page()

        # ç”Ÿæˆæ¯ä¸ªæ ‡ç­¾çš„è¯¦æƒ…é¡µé¢
        self.generate_tag_detail_pages()

    def generate_list_page(self):
        """ç”Ÿæˆæ ‡ç­¾åˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢"""
        template = """
# æ ‡ç­¾åˆ—è¡¨

{% for tag, posts in tags.items() %}
## {{ tag }}

{% for post in posts %}
- [{{ post.title }}]({{ post.url }}){% if post.description %} - {{ post.description }}{% endif %}
{% endfor %}

{% endfor %}
"""
        # ä½¿ç”¨ Jinja2 æ¸²æŸ“æ¨¡æ¿
        from jinja2 import Template
        content = Template(template).render(tags=self.tags)

        # ä¿å­˜é¡µé¢
        output_file = Path(self.config['docs_dir']) / 'tags' / 'list.md'
        output_file.parent.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
        output_file.write_text(content, encoding='utf-8')

    def generate_tag_detail_pages(self):
        """ç”Ÿæˆæ¯ä¸ªæ ‡ç­¾çš„è¯¦æƒ…é¡µé¢"""
        template = """
# æ ‡ç­¾: {{ tag }}

## ç›¸å…³æ–‡ç« 

{% for post in posts %}
### [{{ post.title }}]({{ post.url }})
{% if post.description %}
{{ post.description }}
{% endif %}
{% endfor %}

## ç›¸å…³æ ‡ç­¾
{% for related_tag in related_tags %}
- [{{ related_tag }}](../{{ related_tag | lower }})
{% endfor %}
"""
        # æ ‡ç­¾ç›®å½•
        tags_dir = Path(self.config['docs_dir']) / 'tags'
        tags_dir.mkdir(exist_ok=True)

        # ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªæ ‡ç­¾ç”Ÿæˆé¡µé¢
        for tag, posts in self.tags.items():
            # æŸ¥æ‰¾ç›¸å…³æ ‡ç­¾
            related_tags = self.find_related_tags(tag)

            # æ¸²æŸ“å†…å®¹
            content = Template(template).render(
                tag=tag,
                posts=posts,
                related_tags=related_tags
            )

            # ä¿å­˜é¡µé¢
            output_file = tags_dir / f"{tag.lower()}.md"
            output_file.write_text(content, encoding='utf-8')

    def find_related_tags(self, current_tag):
        """æŸ¥æ‰¾ç›¸å…³æ ‡ç­¾"""
        related = set()

        # è·å–å½“å‰æ ‡ç­¾çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ–‡ç« 
        current_posts = self.tags[current_tag]

        # éå†æ‰€æœ‰å…¶ä»–æ ‡ç­¾
        for tag, posts in self.tags.items():
            if tag == current_tag:
                continue

            # è®¡ç®—æ–‡ç« äº¤é›†
            intersection = set(p['url'] for p in posts) & \
                          set(p['url'] for p in current_posts)

            # å¦‚æœæœ‰å…±åŒæ–‡ç« ï¼Œè®¤ä¸ºæ˜¯ç›¸å…³æ ‡ç­¾
            if intersection:
                related.add(tag)

        return list(related)
    1. æ ‡ç­¾é¡µé¢æ ·å¼ï¼š
    CSS
    /* docs/stylesheets/tags-page.css */
/* æ ‡ç­¾åˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢ */
.tags-list {
    margin: 2rem 0;
}

.tag-section {
    margin-bottom: 3rem;
}

.tag-section h2 {
    color: var(--md-accent-fg-color);
    border-bottom: 2px solid var(--md-accent-fg-color);
    padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.tag-section .post-list {
    margin-left: 1rem;
}

.post-list-item {
    margin: 1rem 0;
}

.post-list-item .post-title {
    font-weight: 500;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color);
    text-decoration: none;
}

.post-list-item .post-description {
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color--light);
    margin-top: 0.2rem;
}

/* æ ‡ç­¾è¯¦æƒ…é¡µé¢ */
.tag-detail {
    padding: 2rem;
}

.tag-detail-header {
    text-align: center;
    margin-bottom: 3rem;
}

.tag-detail-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
    color: var(--md-primary-fg-color);
}

.tag-detail-count {
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color--light);
}

.related-posts {
    margin: 2rem 0;
}

.related-post {
    padding: 1rem;
    margin: 1rem 0;
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    border-radius: 8px;
    transition: transform 0.2s ease;
}

.related-post:hover {
    transform: translateX(0.5rem);
}

.related-tags {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    margin: 2rem 0;
}

.related-tag {
    padding: 0.2rem 0.8rem;
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    border-radius: 2rem;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color);
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.related-tag:hover {
    background: var(--md-accent-fg-color);
    color: white;
}
    1. é¡µé¢äº¤äº’åŠŸèƒ½ï¼š
    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/tags.js
class TagsManager {
    constructor() {
        this.initializeFilters();
        this.setupSearch();
        this.setupSorting();
    }

    initializeFilters() {
        const tagList = document.querySelector('.tags-list');
        if (!tagList) return;

        // åˆ›å»ºè¿‡æ»¤å™¨
        const filterContainer = document.createElement('div');
        filterContainer.className = 'tags-filter';
        filterContainer.innerHTML = `
            <input type="text" 
                   class="filter-input" 
                   placeholder="æœç´¢æ ‡ç­¾...">
            <select class="sort-select">
                <option value="name">æŒ‰åç§°æ’åº</option>
                <option value="count">æŒ‰æ–‡ç« æ•°é‡æ’åº</option>
            </select>
        `;

        tagList.insertBefore(filterContainer, tagList.firstChild);
    }

    setupSearch() {
        const input = document.querySelector('.filter-input');
        if (!input) return;

        input.addEventListener('input', () => {
            const query = input.value.toLowerCase();
            const sections = document.querySelectorAll('.tag-section');

            sections.forEach(section => {
                const tag = section.querySelector('h2').textContent.toLowerCase();
                section.style.display = tag.includes(query) ? 'block' : 'none';
            });
        });
    }

    setupSorting() {
        const select = document.querySelector('.sort-select');
        if (!select) return;

        select.addEventListener('change', () => {
            const sections = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.tag-section'));
            const container = sections[0].parentElement;

            sections.sort((a, b) => {
                const aTag = a.querySelector('h2').textContent;
                const bTag = b.querySelector('h2').textContent;
                const aCount = this.getPostCount(a);
                const bCount = this.getPostCount(b);

                if (select.value === 'name') {
                    return aTag.localeCompare(bTag);
                } else {
                    return bCount - aCount;
                }
            });

            // é‡æ–°æ’å…¥æ’åºåçš„ç« èŠ‚
            sections.forEach(section => container.appendChild(section));
        });
    }

    getPostCount(section) {
        return section.querySelectorAll('.post-list-item').length;
    }
}

// åˆå§‹åŒ–æ ‡ç­¾ç®¡ç†å™¨
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    new TagsManager();
});

    ä½¿ç”¨ä»¥ä¸Šä»£ç ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥å®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªåŠŸèƒ½å®Œæ•´çš„æ ‡ç­¾ç³»ç»Ÿï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ï¼š

    1. æ ‡ç­¾äº‘å¯è§†åŒ–
    2. æ ‡ç­¾åˆ—è¡¨æµè§ˆ
    3. æ ‡ç­¾è¯¦æƒ…é¡µé¢
    4. ç›¸å…³æ ‡ç­¾æ¨è
    5. æ ‡ç­¾æœç´¢å’Œæ’åº
    6. å“åº”å¼å¸ƒå±€

    é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶éœ€è¦æ·»åŠ ç›¸åº”çš„å¼•ç”¨ï¼š

    YAML
    # mkdocs.yml
extra_css:
  - stylesheets/tags.css
  - stylesheets/tags-page.css

extra_javascript:
  - javascripts/tags.js

    9 åŠŸèƒ½æ‰©å±• Â¶

    9.1 è¯„è®ºç³»ç»Ÿ Â¶

    9.1.1 Giscus é…ç½® Â¶

    1. åŸºç¡€é…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    # mkdocs.yml
extra:
  comments:
    provider: giscus
    repo: username/repo
    repo_id: your_repo_id
    category: Comments
    category_id: your_category_id
    1. Giscus ç»„ä»¶ï¼š
    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/partials/comments.html -->
{% if config.extra.comments.provider == 'giscus' %}
<div class="comments-container">
    <h3>è¯„è®º</h3>
    <div class="giscus"></div>

    <script>
        function loadGiscus() {
            const script = document.createElement('script');
            script.src = 'https://giscus.app/client.js';
            script.setAttribute('data-repo', '{{ config.extra.comments.repo }}');
            script.setAttribute('data-repo-id', '{{ config.extra.comments.repo_id }}');
            script.setAttribute('data-category', '{{ config.extra.comments.category }}');
            script.setAttribute('data-category-id', '{{ config.extra.comments.category_id }}');
            script.setAttribute('data-mapping', 'pathname');
            script.setAttribute('data-reactions-enabled', '1');
            script.setAttribute('data-emit-metadata', '0');
            script.setAttribute('data-theme', 'preferred_color_scheme');
            script.setAttribute('crossorigin', 'anonymous');
            script.async = true;

            document.querySelector('.giscus').appendChild(script);
        }

        // å»¶è¿ŸåŠ è½½è¯„è®º
        if ('IntersectionObserver' in window) {
            const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
                if (entries[0].isIntersecting) {
                    loadGiscus();
                    observer.disconnect();
                }
            });

            observer.observe(document.querySelector('.comments-container'));
        } else {
            loadGiscus();
        }
    </script>
</div>
{% endif %}

    9.1.2 è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¯„è®ºæ ·å¼ Â¶

    CSS
    /* docs/stylesheets/comments.css */
.comments-container {
    margin: 3rem 0;
    padding-top: 2rem;
    border-top: 1px solid var(--md-default-fg-color--lightest);
}

.giscus {
    width: 100%;
}

/* Giscus ä¸»é¢˜é€‚é… */
.giscus-frame {
    background-color: var(--md-default-bg-color);
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color);
}

/* æš—è‰²æ¨¡å¼é€‚é… */
[data-md-color-scheme="slate"] .giscus-frame {
    background-color: var(--md-default-bg-color--dark);
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color--dark);
}

/* è¯„è®ºæ¡†æ ·å¼ */
.giscus .gsc-comment-box {
    background-color: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    border-radius: 8px;
    padding: 1rem;
}

/* è¯„è®ºåˆ—è¡¨æ ·å¼ */
.giscus .gsc-comment {
    margin: 1rem 0;
    padding: 1rem;
    background-color: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    border-radius: 8px;
    transition: transform 0.2s ease;
}

.giscus .gsc-comment:hover {
    transform: translateX(4px);
}

/* æŒ‰é’®æ ·å¼ */
.giscus .gsc-button {
    background-color: var(--md-primary-fg-color);
    color: var(--md-primary-bg-color);
    border: none;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    border-radius: 4px;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.giscus .gsc-button:hover {
    background-color: var(--md-primary-fg-color--dark);
}

    9.2 æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡ Â¶

    9.2.1 Google AnalyticsÂ¶

    1. GA4 é…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    # mkdocs.yml
extra:
  analytics:
    provider: google
    property: G-XXXXXXXXXX

    # äº‹ä»¶è¿½è¸ª
    events: true
    # ç”¨æˆ·è¡Œä¸ºè¿½è¸ª
    behavior: true
    1. GA4 å®ç°ï¼š
    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/partials/analytics.html -->
{% if config.extra.analytics.provider == 'google' %}
<!-- Google Analytics -->
<script async src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id={{ config.extra.analytics.property }}"></script>
<script>
  window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
  function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);}
  gtag('js', new Date());
  gtag('config', '{{ config.extra.analytics.property }}');

  // äº‹ä»¶è¿½è¸ª
  if ({{ config.extra.analytics.events|tojson }}) {
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
          // ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶è¿½è¸ª
          document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
              const target = e.target.closest('a');
              if (target) {
                  gtag('event', 'click', {
                      'event_category': 'link',
                      'event_label': target.href
                  });
              }
          });

          // æ»šåŠ¨äº‹ä»¶è¿½è¸ª
          let lastScrollDepth = 0;
          window.addEventListener('scroll', debounce(function() {
              const scrollDepth = Math.round(
                  (window.scrollY + window.innerHeight) / 
                  document.documentElement.scrollHeight * 100
              );

              if (scrollDepth > lastScrollDepth) {
                  gtag('event', 'scroll_depth', {
                      'depth': scrollDepth
                  });
                  lastScrollDepth = scrollDepth;
              }
          }, 500));

          // æœç´¢äº‹ä»¶è¿½è¸ª
          const searchInput = document.querySelector('.md-search__input');
          if (searchInput) {
              searchInput.addEventListener('search', function() {
                  gtag('event', 'search', {
                      'search_term': this.value
                  });
              });
          }
      });
  }

  // ç”¨æˆ·è¡Œä¸ºè¿½è¸ª
  if ({{ config.extra.analytics.behavior|tojson }}) {
      // é¡µé¢åœç•™æ—¶é—´
      let startTime = Date.now();
      window.addEventListener('beforeunload', function() {
          const duration = Math.round((Date.now() - startTime) / 1000);
          gtag('event', 'time_on_page', {
              'duration': duration
          });
      });

      // å¤åˆ¶è¡Œä¸ºè¿½è¸ª
      document.addEventListener('copy', function() {
          gtag('event', 'content_copy');
      });
  }
</script>
{% endif %}

    9.2.2 ä¸è’œå­ç»Ÿè®¡ Â¶

    1. ä¸è’œå­é…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    extra:
  analytics:
    busuanzi: true
    1. ä¸è’œå­å®ç°ï¼š
    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/partials/busuanzi.html -->
{% if config.extra.analytics.busuanzi %}
<script async src="//busuanzi.ibruce.info/busuanzi/2.3/busuanzi.pure.mini.js"></script>

<div class="page-views">
    <!-- æ€»è®¿é—®é‡ -->
    <span id="busuanzi_container_site_pv">
        æ€»è®¿é—®é‡: <span id="busuanzi_value_site_pv"></span>æ¬¡
    </span>

    <!-- æ€»è®¿å®¢æ•° -->
    <span id="busuanzi_container_site_uv">
        è®¿å®¢æ•°: <span id="busuanzi_value_site_uv"></span>äºº
    </span>

    <!-- é¡µé¢è®¿é—®é‡ -->
    <span id="busuanzi_container_page_pv">
        æœ¬æ–‡è®¿é—®é‡: <span id="busuanzi_value_page_pv"></span>æ¬¡
    </span>
</div>

<style>
.page-views {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1rem;
    margin: 1rem 0;
    padding: 0.5rem;
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    border-radius: 4px;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.page-views span {
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color--light);
}

    font-weight: bold;
}
</style>
{% endif %}

    9.3 ç¤¾äº¤åˆ†äº« Â¶

    9.3.1 åˆ†äº«æŒ‰é’® Â¶

    1. åˆ†äº«é…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    extra:
  social_share:
    enabled: true
    platforms:
      - name: twitter
        icon: material/twitter
        color: '#1DA1F2'
      - name: facebook
        icon: material/facebook
        color: '#4267B2'
      - name: linkedin
        icon: material/linkedin
        color: '#0A66C2'
      - name: weibo
        icon: material/sina-weibo
        color: '#E6162D'
    1. åˆ†äº«æŒ‰é’®å®ç°ï¼š
    HTML
    <!-- docs/overrides/partials/share.html -->
{% if config.extra.social_share.enabled %}
<div class="share-container">
    <h4>åˆ†äº«æ–‡ç« </h4>
    <div class="share-buttons">
        {% for platform in config.extra.social_share.platforms %}
        <button class="share-button" 
                data-platform="{{ platform.name }}"
                style="--platform-color: {{ platform.color }}"
                onclick="shareContent('{{ platform.name }}')">
            <span class="share-icon">
                {% include ".icons/" ~ platform.icon ~ ".svg" %}
            </span>
            <span class="share-text">åˆ†äº«åˆ° {{ platform.name|title }}</span>
        </button>
        {% endfor %}
    </div>
</div>

<style>
.share-container {
    margin: 2rem 0;
}

.share-buttons {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    margin-top: 1rem;
}

.share-button {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 4px;
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
    color: var(--platform-color);
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.share-button:hover {
    background: var(--platform-color);
    color: white;
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.share-icon {
    margin-right: 0.5rem;
}
</style>

    9.3.2 åˆ†äº«é“¾æ¥ç”Ÿæˆ Â¶

    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/share.js
class ShareManager {
    constructor() {
        this.title = document.title;
        this.url = window.location.href;
        this.description = document
            .querySelector('meta[name="description"]')
            ?.content || '';
    }

    generateShareUrl(platform) {
        const params = new URLSearchParams();
        switch (platform) {
            case 'twitter':
                return `https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?${
                    params.set('text', this.title),
                    params.set('url', this.url)
                }`;

            case 'facebook':
                return `https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?${
                    params.set('u', this.url)
                }`;

            case 'linkedin':
                return `https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?${
                    params.set('url', this.url)
                }`;

            case 'weibo':
                return `http://service.weibo.com/share/share.php?${
                    params.set('title', this.title),
                    params.set('url', this.url)
                }`;

            default:
                return null;
        }
    }

    async share(platform) {
        // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æ”¯æŒåŸç”Ÿåˆ†äº«
        if (navigator.share && platform === 'native') {
            try {
                await navigator.share({
                    title: this.title,
                    text: this.description,
                    url: this.url
                });
                return true;
            } catch (err) {
                console.warn('Native share failed:', err);
                return false;
            }
        }

        // ä½¿ç”¨å¼¹çª—åˆ†äº«
        const url = this.generateShareUrl(platform);
        if (url) {
            window.open(url, '_blank', 'width=600,height=400');
            return true;
        }

        return false;
    }

    // è‡ªå®šä¹‰åˆ†äº«å†…å®¹
    setContent(title, description) {
        this.title = title;
        this.description = description;
    }
}

// å…¨å±€åˆ†äº«åŠŸèƒ½
window.shareContent = async function(platform) {
    const shareManager = new ShareManager();
    const success = await shareManager.share(platform);

    // è®°å½•åˆ†äº«äº‹ä»¶
    if (success) {
        recordShare(platform);
    }
};

// åˆ†äº«ç»Ÿè®¡
function recordShare(platform) {
    // GA4 äº‹ä»¶è¿½è¸ª
    if (typeof gtag !== 'undefined') {
        gtag('event', 'share', {
            'platform': platform,
            'title': document.title,
            'url': window.location.href
        });
    }

    // æœ¬åœ°å­˜å‚¨ç»Ÿè®¡
    const stats = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('share_stats') || '{}');
    stats[platform] = (stats[platform] || 0) + 1;
    localStorage.setItem('share_stats', JSON.stringify(stats));

    updateShareCount(platform);
}

// æ›´æ–°åˆ†äº«è®¡æ•°
function updateShareCount(platform) {
    const countElement = document.querySelector(
        `.share-count[data-platform="${platform}"]`
    );
    if (countElement) {
        const stats = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('share_stats') || '{}');
        countElement.textContent = stats[platform] || 0;
    }
}

    9.4 ç«™å†…æœç´¢ Â¶

    9.4.1 æœç´¢ä¼˜åŒ– Â¶

    1. æœç´¢é…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    plugins:
  - search:
      lang:
        - en
        - zh
      separator: '[\s\-\.,!\?ï¼Œã€‚ï¼ï¼Ÿ]+'  # åˆ†è¯åˆ†éš”ç¬¦
      prebuild_index: true
      indexing:
        full_sections: true
        headings: true
        content: true
        tags: true

      # é«˜çº§æœç´¢é…ç½®
      search_boost: true     # å¯ç”¨æœç´¢æå‡
      search_threshold: 0.3  # æœç´¢é˜ˆå€¼
      search_fields:         # æœç´¢å­—æ®µæƒé‡
        title: 10
        tags: 8
        content: 5

    æœç´¢ä¼˜åŒ–å®ç°ï¼š

    JavaScript
    // docs/javascripts/search-enhance.js
class SearchEnhancer {
    constructor() {
        this.searchIndex = null;
        this.searchResults = [];
        this.searchHistory = [];
        this.maxHistoryItems = 10;

        this.init();
    }

    async init() {
        // åŠ è½½æœç´¢ç´¢å¼•
        await this.loadSearchIndex();
        // åŠ è½½æœç´¢å†å²
        this.loadSearchHistory();
        // åˆå§‹åŒ–æœç´¢ç»„ä»¶
        this.setupSearch();
    }

    async loadSearchIndex() {
        try {
            const response = await fetch('/search/search_index.json');
            const data = await response.json();

            // ä½¿ç”¨ Lunr.js æ„å»ºç´¢å¼•
            this.searchIndex = lunr(function() {
                this.use(lunr.multiLanguage('en', 'zh'));

                this.ref('location');
                this.field('title', { boost: 10 });
                this.field('tags', { boost: 8 });
                this.field('text', { boost: 5 });

                data.docs.forEach(function(doc) {
                    this.add(doc);
                }, this);
            });
        } catch (error) {
            console.error('Failed to load search index:', error);
        }
    }

    setupSearch() {
        const searchInput = document.querySelector('.md-search__input');
        if (!searchInput) return;

        // é˜²æŠ–å¤„ç†
        searchInput.addEventListener('input', debounce((e) => {
            const query = e.target.value;
            if (query.length >= 2) {
                this.performSearch(query);
            } else {
                this.clearResults();
            }
        }, 200));

        // æœç´¢å†å²
        searchInput.addEventListener('focus', () => {
            this.showSearchHistory();
        });
    }

    performSearch(query) {
        if (!this.searchIndex) return;

        try {
            // æ‰§è¡Œæœç´¢
            this.searchResults = this.searchIndex.search(query);

            // ç»“æœåå¤„ç†
            this.searchResults = this.postProcessResults(this.searchResults, query);

            // æ˜¾ç¤ºç»“æœ
            this.displayResults(this.searchResults);

            // æ˜¾ç¤ºæœç´¢å»ºè®®
            this.showSearchSuggestions(query);
        } catch (error) {
            console.error('Search failed:', error);
        }
    }

    postProcessResults(results, query) {
        return results
            .map(result => {
                // è®¡ç®—ç›¸å…³åº¦åˆ†æ•°
                const score = this.calculateRelevanceScore(result, query);

                return {
                    ...result,
                    score: score,
                    highlights: this.generateHighlights(result, query)
                };
            })
            // æŒ‰åˆ†æ•°æ’åº
            .sort((a, b) => b.score - a.score)
            // é™åˆ¶ç»“æœæ•°é‡
            .slice(0, 10);
    }

    calculateRelevanceScore(result, query) {
        let score = result.score;

        // æ ‡é¢˜åŒ¹é…åŠ åˆ†
        if (result.title?.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())) {
            score *= 1.5;
        }

        // æ ‡ç­¾åŒ¹é…åŠ åˆ†
        if (result.tags?.some(tag => 
            tag.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())
        )) {
            score *= 1.2;
        }

        return score;
    }

    generateHighlights(result, query) {
        const text = result.text || '';
        const words = query.toLowerCase().split(/\s+/);
        const context = 50; // ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡é•¿åº¦

        let highlights = [];

        words.forEach(word => {
            let index = text.toLowerCase().indexOf(word);
            while (index > -1) {
                const start = Math.max(0, index - context);
                const end = Math.min(text.length, index + word.length + context);
                const highlight = text.slice(start, end);

                highlights.push({
                    text: highlight,
                    position: start
                });

                index = text.toLowerCase().indexOf(word, index + 1);
            }
        });

        // åˆå¹¶é‡å çš„é«˜äº®ç‰‡æ®µ
        return this.mergeHighlights(highlights);
    }

    mergeHighlights(highlights) {
        if (highlights.length === 0) return [];

        highlights.sort((a, b) => a.position - b.position);

        let merged = [highlights[0]];
        for (let i = 1; i < highlights.length; i++) {
            let current = highlights[i];
            let last = merged[merged.length - 1];

            if (current.position <= last.position + last.text.length) {
                // åˆå¹¶é‡å çš„ç‰‡æ®µ
                last.text = last.text.slice(0, current.position - last.position) +
                           current.text;
            } else {
                merged.push(current);
            }
        }

        return merged;
    }

    loadSearchHistory() {
        try {
            this.searchHistory = JSON.parse(
                localStorage.getItem('search_history')
            ) || [];
        } catch (error) {
            this.searchHistory = [];
        }
    }

    saveSearchHistory(query) {
        if (!query) return;

        // ç§»é™¤é‡å¤é¡¹
        this.searchHistory = this.searchHistory.filter(item => 
            item.query !== query
        );

        // æ·»åŠ æ–°é¡¹
        this.searchHistory.unshift({
            query: query,
            timestamp: Date.now()
        });

        // é™åˆ¶å†å²è®°å½•æ•°é‡
        if (this.searchHistory.length > this.maxHistoryItems) {
            this.searchHistory.pop();
        }

        // ä¿å­˜åˆ°æœ¬åœ°å­˜å‚¨
        localStorage.setItem(
            'search_history',
            JSON.stringify(this.searchHistory)
        );
    }

    showSearchHistory() {
        const container = document.querySelector('.md-search__history');
        if (!container) return;

        // æ¸…ç©ºå®¹å™¨
        container.innerHTML = '';

        // æ˜¾ç¤ºå†å²è®°å½•
        this.searchHistory.forEach(item => {
            const element = document.createElement('div');
            element.className = 'search-history-item';
            element.innerHTML = `
                <span class="history-icon">
                    {% include ".icons/material/history.svg" %}
                </span>
                <span class="history-query">${item.query}</span>
                <span class="history-time">
                    ${this.formatTime(item.timestamp)}
                </span>
            `;

            element.addEventListener('click', () => {
                const searchInput = document.querySelector('.md-search__input');
                if (searchInput) {
                    searchInput.value = item.query;
                    searchInput.dispatchEvent(new Event('input'));
                }
            });

            container.appendChild(element);
        });
    }

    formatTime(timestamp) {
        const now = Date.now();
        const diff = now - timestamp;

        if (diff < 60000) return 'åˆšåˆš';
        if (diff < 3600000) return `${Math.floor(diff/60000)}åˆ†é’Ÿå‰`;
        if (diff < 86400000) return `${Math.floor(diff/3600000)}å°æ—¶å‰`;
        return `${Math.floor(diff/86400000)}å¤©å‰`;
    }
}

// åˆå§‹åŒ–æœç´¢å¢å¼º
new SearchEnhancer();

    æœç´¢ç›¸å…³æ ·å¼ï¼š

    CSS
    /* docs/stylesheets/search.css */
/* æœç´¢å†å² */
.search-history-item {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: background 0.2s ease;
}

.search-history-item:hover {
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
}

.history-icon {
    margin-right: 0.5rem;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color--light);
}

.history-query {
    flex: 1;
    font-weight: 500;
}

.history-time {
    font-size: 0.8rem;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color--light);
}

/* æœç´¢å»ºè®® */
.search-suggestions {
    padding: 1rem;
}

.suggestion-item {
    padding: 0.5rem;
    border-radius: 4px;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: background 0.2s ease;
}

.suggestion-item:hover {
    background: var(--md-code-bg-color);
}

/* é«˜äº®æ–‡æœ¬ */
.search-highlight {
    background: var(--md-accent-fg-color);
    color: white;
    padding: 0 0.2rem;
    border-radius: 2px;
}

/* æœç´¢ç»“æœ */
.search-result {
    padding: 1rem;
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--md-default-fg-color--lightest);
}

.result-title {
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.result-excerpt {
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color--light);
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.result-meta {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1rem;
    font-size: 0.8rem;
    color: var(--md-default-fg-color--lighter);
}

    ä½¿ç”¨è¿™äº›ä»£ç ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥å®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªåŠŸèƒ½å®Œå–„çš„æœç´¢ç³»ç»Ÿï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ï¼š

    1. é«˜æ€§èƒ½æœç´¢
    2. æ™ºèƒ½ç»“æœæ’åº
    3. æœç´¢å†å²è®°å½•
    4. æœç´¢å»ºè®®
    5. ç»“æœé«˜äº®
    6. å¤šè¯­è¨€æ”¯æŒ

    è®°å¾—åœ¨ mkdocs.yml ä¸­æ·»åŠ ç›¸åº”çš„å¼•ç”¨ï¼š

    YAML
    extra_css:
  - stylesheets/search.css

extra_javascript:
  - https://unpkg.com/lunr/lunr.js
  - https://unpkg.com/lunr-languages/lunr.stemmer.support.js
  - https://unpkg.com/lunr-languages/lunr.zh.js
  - javascripts/search-enhance.js

    10 éƒ¨ç½²æ–¹æ¡ˆ Â¶

    10.1 æœ¬åœ°éƒ¨ç½² Â¶

    10.1.1 æ„å»ºé™æ€æ–‡ä»¶ Â¶

    ä½¿ç”¨ MkDocs æ„å»ºé™æ€æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š

    Bash
    # æ„å»ºç«™ç‚¹
mkdocs build

# æŒ‡å®šè¾“å‡ºç›®å½•
mkdocs build -d custom_site_dir

# æ¸…ç†å¹¶æ„å»º
mkdocs build --clean

    æ„å»ºé€‰é¡¹è¯´æ˜ï¼š

    YAML
    # mkdocs.yml
site_dir: site               # è¾“å‡ºç›®å½•
docs_dir: docs              # æ–‡æ¡£æºç›®å½•
strict: true                # ä¸¥æ ¼æ¨¡å¼
use_directory_urls: true    # ä½¿ç”¨ç›®å½• URL

    10.1.2 æœ¬åœ°æœåŠ¡å™¨ Â¶

    å¼€å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨é…ç½®ï¼š

    Bash
    # å¯åŠ¨å¼€å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨
mkdocs serve

# æŒ‡å®šç«¯å£
mkdocs serve -a localhost:8080

# è‡ªåŠ¨é‡è½½
mkdocs serve --dirtyreload

    å¼€å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨é«˜çº§é…ç½®ï¼š

    YAML
    # mkdocs.yml
dev_addr: 127.0.0.1:8000    # å¼€å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨åœ°å€
watch: [docs, includes]      # ç›‘è§†çš„ç›®å½•

    10.2 GitHub Pages éƒ¨ç½² Â¶

    10.2.1 ä»“åº“é…ç½® Â¶

    1. åˆ›å»º GitHub ä»“åº“ï¼š - åˆ›å»ºæ–°ä»“åº“æˆ–ä½¿ç”¨ç°æœ‰ä»“åº“ - ä»“åº“åæ ¼å¼ï¼š username.github.io æˆ–æ™®é€šä»“åº“å

    2. é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š

    YAML
    # mkdocs.yml
site_url: https://username.github.io/repository/
repo_url: https://github.com/username/repository
edit_uri: edit/main/docs/
    1. åˆå§‹åŒ–ä»“åº“ï¼š
    Bash
    # åˆå§‹åŒ– Git ä»“åº“
git init

# æ·»åŠ è¿œç¨‹ä»“åº“
git remote add origin https://github.com/username/repository.git

# æäº¤åˆå§‹æ–‡ä»¶
git add .
git commit -m "Initial commit"
git push -u origin main

    10.2.2 GitHub ActionsÂ¶

    åˆ›å»º GitHub Actions å·¥ä½œæµæ–‡ä»¶ï¼š

    YAML
    # .github/workflows/ci.yml
name: ci 
on:
  push:
    branches: 
      - main
permissions:
  contents: write
jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Configure Git Credentials
        run: |
          git config user.name github-actions[bot]
          git config user.email 41898282+github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com
      - uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: 3.x
      - run: echo "cache_id=$(date --utc '+%V')" >> $GITHUB_ENV 
      - uses: actions/cache@v3
        with:
          key: mkdocs-material-${{ env.cache_id }}
          path: .cache
          restore-keys: |
            mkdocs-material-
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          pip install mkdocs-material
          pip install mkdocs-glightbox
          pip install mkdocs-git-revision-date-localized-plugin
      - name: Deploy
        run: mkdocs gh-deploy --force

    10.2.3 è‡ªåŠ¨éƒ¨ç½² Â¶

    é…ç½®è‡ªåŠ¨éƒ¨ç½²ï¼š

    1. å¯ç”¨ GitHub Pagesï¼š - è¿›å…¥ä»“åº“è®¾ç½® -> Pages - Source é€‰æ‹© gh-pages åˆ†æ”¯ - ä¿å­˜è®¾ç½®

    2. é…ç½®éƒ¨ç½²åˆ†æ”¯ï¼š

    YAML
    # mkdocs.yml
remote_branch: gh-pages    # GitHub Pages åˆ†æ”¯
remote_name: origin       # è¿œç¨‹ä»“åº“å
    1. æ‰‹åŠ¨éƒ¨ç½²å‘½ä»¤ï¼š
    Bash
    # éƒ¨ç½²åˆ° GitHub Pages
mkdocs gh-deploy

# å¼ºåˆ¶éƒ¨ç½²
mkdocs gh-deploy --force

# æŒ‡å®šåˆ†æ”¯
mkdocs gh-deploy --remote-branch custom-branch

    10.2.4 è‡ªå®šä¹‰åŸŸå Â¶

    1. æ·»åŠ  CNAME æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š
    Bash
    # docs/CNAME
docs.example.com

    1. DNS é…ç½®ï¼š - æ·»åŠ  CNAME è®°å½•æŒ‡å‘ username.github.io - æˆ–æ·»åŠ  A è®°å½•æŒ‡å‘ GitHub Pages IP

    2. é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶æ›´æ–°ï¼š

    YAML
    # mkdocs.yml
site_url: https://docs.example.com/

    10.3 æŒç»­é›†æˆ Â¶

    10.3.1 CI/CD é…ç½® Â¶

    é«˜çº§ GitHub Actions é…ç½®ï¼š

    YAML
    name: CI/CD Pipeline
on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: 3.x

      - name: Cache dependencies
        uses: actions/cache@v3
        with:
          path: ~/.cache/pip
          key: ${{ runner.os }}-pip-${{ hashFiles('requirements.txt') }}
          restore-keys: |
            ${{ runner.os }}-pip-

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install -r requirements.txt

      - name: Run tests
        run: |
          mkdocs build --strict

  deploy:
    needs: test
    if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
        run: |
          mkdocs gh-deploy --force

    10.3.2 è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–æµ‹è¯• Â¶

    1. é“¾æ¥æ£€æŸ¥ï¼š
    YAML
    name: Link Check
on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 0 * * *'  # æ¯å¤©è¿è¡Œ
jobs:
  linkCheck:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Link Checker
        uses: lycheeverse/lychee-action@v1.8.0
        with:
          args: --verbose --no-progress 'docs/**/*.md'
    1. HTML éªŒè¯ï¼š
    YAML
    name: HTML Validation
jobs:
  validate:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Build site
        run: mkdocs build
      - name: Validate HTML
        uses: Cyb3r-Jak3/html5validator-action@v7.2.0
        with:
          root: site/

    10.3.3 éƒ¨ç½²ç­–ç•¥ Â¶

    1. åˆ†æ”¯ç­–ç•¥é…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    # ä¿æŠ¤åˆ†æ”¯è®¾ç½®
branches:
  - name: main
    protection:
      required_status_checks:
        strict: true
        contexts: ['test', 'build']
      required_pull_request_reviews:
        required_approving_review_count: 1
    1. ç¯å¢ƒé…ç½®ï¼š
    YAML
    # ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡è®¾ç½®
env:
  production:
    url: https://docs.example.com
    branch: main
  staging:
    url: https://staging.docs.example.com
    branch: staging
    1. éƒ¨ç½²å·¥ä½œæµï¼š
    YAML
    name: Deployment
on:
  push:
    branches: [main, staging]
jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    environment:
      name: ${{ github.ref == 'refs/heads/main' && 'production' || 'staging' }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Build and Deploy
        env:
          DEPLOY_URL: ${{ github.ref == 'refs/heads/main' && env.production.url || env.staging.url }}
        run: |
          mkdocs build
          # éƒ¨ç½²åˆ°ç›¸åº”ç¯å¢ƒ

    11 é™„å½• Â¶

    11.1 A. å¸¸ç”¨é…ç½®ç¤ºä¾‹ Â¶

    11.1.1 A.1 mkdocs. yml å®Œæ•´ç¤ºä¾‹ Â¶

    YAML
    # ç«™ç‚¹åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯é…ç½®
site_name: é¡¹ç›®æ–‡æ¡£            # ç«™ç‚¹åç§°
site_url: https://example.com  # ç«™ç‚¹URL
site_author: ä½œè€…åç§°          # ä½œè€…ä¿¡æ¯
site_description: >-          # ç«™ç‚¹æè¿°
  è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå®Œæ•´çš„æ–‡æ¡£ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼ŒåŒ…å«äº†MkDocs Materialä¸»é¢˜çš„æ‰€æœ‰ä¸»è¦åŠŸèƒ½é…ç½®ã€‚

# ä»£ç ä»“åº“ä¿¡æ¯
repo_name: username/repo      # ä»“åº“åç§°
repo_url: https://github.com/username/repo  # ä»“åº“åœ°å€
edit_uri: edit/main/docs/     # ç¼–è¾‘é“¾æ¥

# ç‰ˆæƒä¿¡æ¯
copyright: Copyright &copy; 2024 # ç‰ˆæƒå£°æ˜

# ä¸»é¢˜é…ç½®
theme:
  name: material               # ä½¿ç”¨Materialä¸»é¢˜
  custom_dir: overrides       # è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç›®å½•

  # ä¸»é¢˜ç‰¹æ€§é…ç½®
  features:
    # å¯¼èˆªç›¸å…³
    - navigation.tabs         # é¡¶éƒ¨æ ‡ç­¾å¯¼èˆª
    - navigation.sections     # ä¾§è¾¹æ åˆ†ç»„
    - navigation.expand      # é»˜è®¤å±•å¼€å¯¼èˆª
    - navigation.indexes     # å¯¼èˆªç´¢å¼•é¡µ
    - navigation.top         # è¿”å›é¡¶éƒ¨æŒ‰é’®
    - navigation.footer      # ä¸Šä¸€é¡µ/ä¸‹ä¸€é¡µå¯¼èˆª

    # æœç´¢ç›¸å…³
    - search.suggest        # æœç´¢å»ºè®®
    - search.highlight     # æœç´¢é«˜äº®
    - search.share        # æœç´¢åˆ†äº«

    # ä»£ç ç›¸å…³
    - content.code.annotate # ä»£ç æ³¨é‡Š
    - content.code.copy    # ä»£ç å¤åˆ¶

    # å…¶ä»–åŠŸèƒ½
    - announce.dismiss     # å¯å…³é—­å…¬å‘Š
    - header.autohide     # è‡ªåŠ¨éšè—å¤´éƒ¨

  # é…è‰²æ–¹æ¡ˆ
  palette:
    # äº®è‰²ä¸»é¢˜
    - media: "(prefers-color-scheme: light)"
      scheme: default
      primary: indigo     # ä¸»è‰²
      accent: indigo      # å¼ºè°ƒè‰²
      toggle:
        icon: material/brightness-7
        name: åˆ‡æ¢è‡³æš—è‰²æ¨¡å¼

    # æš—è‰²ä¸»é¢˜
    - media: "(prefers-color-scheme: dark)"
      scheme: slate
      primary: indigo
      accent: indigo
      toggle:
        icon: material/brightness-4
        name: åˆ‡æ¢è‡³äº®è‰²æ¨¡å¼

  # å›¾æ ‡å’Œå­—ä½“
  icon:
    logo: material/book-open-page-variant # Logoå›¾æ ‡
    repo: fontawesome/brands/github      # ä»“åº“å›¾æ ‡

  font:
    text: Roboto         # æ­£æ–‡å­—ä½“
    code: Roboto Mono    # ä»£ç å­—ä½“

  language: zh          # ç•Œé¢è¯­è¨€

# æ‰©å±•é…ç½®
markdown_extensions:
  # å†…ç½®æ‰©å±•
  - toc:                 # ç›®å½•
      permalink: true    # æ°¸ä¹…é“¾æ¥
      toc_depth: 3      # ç›®å½•æ·±åº¦
  - tables              # è¡¨æ ¼æ”¯æŒ
  - attr_list           # å±æ€§åˆ—è¡¨
  - def_list            # å®šä¹‰åˆ—è¡¨
  - footnotes           # è„šæ³¨
  - abbr                # ç¼©å†™

  # PyMdown Extensions
  - pymdownx.highlight:    # ä»£ç é«˜äº®
      anchor_linenums: true
      line_spans: __span
      pygments_lang_class: true
  - pymdownx.inlinehilite # è¡Œå†…ä»£ç é«˜äº®
  - pymdownx.snippets     # ä»£ç ç‰‡æ®µ
  - pymdownx.superfences: # è¶…çº§å›´æ 
      custom_fences:
        - name: mermaid
          class: mermaid
          format: !!python/name:pymdownx.superfences.fence_code_format
  - pymdownx.tabbed:     # æ ‡ç­¾é¡µ
      alternate_style: true
  - pymdownx.tasklist:   # ä»»åŠ¡åˆ—è¡¨
      custom_checkbox: true
  - pymdownx.emoji:      # è¡¨æƒ…æ”¯æŒ
      emoji_index: !!python/name:material.extensions.emoji.twemoji
      emoji_generator: !!python/name:material.extensions.emoji.to_svg
  - pymdownx.details    # è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯
  - pymdownx.caret      # ä¸Šæ ‡
  - pymdownx.mark       # æ ‡è®°
  - pymdownx.tilde      # ä¸‹æ ‡
  - pymdownx.keys       # é”®ç›˜æŒ‰é”®

# æ’ä»¶é…ç½®
plugins:
  - search:           # æœç´¢æ’ä»¶
      lang: 
        - en
        - zh
      separator: '[\s\-\.,!\?ï¼Œã€‚ï¼ï¼Ÿ]+'
      prebuild_index: true

  - git-revision-date-localized: # Gitæ—¥æœŸæ’ä»¶
      enable_creation_date: true
      type: datetime

  - minify:          # èµ„æºå‹ç¼©
      minify_html: true
      minify_js: true
      minify_css: true
      htmlmin_opts:
        remove_comments: true

  - social:          # ç¤¾äº¤åˆ†äº«
      cards: true
      cards_color:
        fill: "#0FF1CE"
        text: "#FFFFFF"

  - tags:            # æ ‡ç­¾ç³»ç»Ÿ
      tags_file: tags.md

  - statistics:      # ç»Ÿè®¡
      page_check: true
      page_count: true

# é™„åŠ é…ç½®
extra:
  # ç¤¾äº¤é“¾æ¥
  social:
    - icon: fontawesome/brands/github
      link: https://github.com/username
    - icon: fontawesome/brands/twitter
      link: https://twitter.com/username

  # è¯„è®ºç³»ç»Ÿ
  comments:
    provider: giscus
    repo: username/repo
    repo_id: your_repo_id
    category: Comments
    category_id: your_category_id

  # åˆ†æç»Ÿè®¡
  analytics:
    provider: google
    property: G-XXXXXXXXXX
    feedback:
      title: è¿™ç¯‡æ–‡æ¡£å¯¹æ‚¨æœ‰å¸®åŠ©å—ï¼Ÿ
      ratings:
        - icon: material/thumb-up-outline
          name: æœ‰å¸®åŠ©
          data: 1
          note: >-
            æ„Ÿè°¢æ‚¨çš„åé¦ˆï¼
        - icon: material/thumb-down-outline
          name: æ²¡å¸®åŠ©
          data: 0
          note: >- 
            æ„Ÿè°¢æ‚¨çš„åé¦ˆï¼Œè¯·å‘Šè¯‰æˆ‘ä»¬å¦‚ä½•æ”¹è¿›ã€‚

# é¢å¤–çš„CSSå’ŒJavaScript
extra_css:
  - stylesheets/extra.css      # è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ ·å¼
  - stylesheets/custom.css     # è‡ªå®šä¹‰ä¸»é¢˜

extra_javascript:
  - javascripts/extra.js       # è‡ªå®šä¹‰è„šæœ¬
  - https://unpkg.com/mermaid/dist/mermaid.min.js  # å¤–éƒ¨åº“

    11.1.2 A.2 GitHub Actions å·¥ä½œæµç¤ºä¾‹ Â¶

    YAML
    # .github/workflows/deploy.yml

name: Deploy Documentation
on:
  # è§¦å‘æ¡ä»¶
  push:
    branches:
      - main
    paths:
      - 'docs/**'
      - 'mkdocs.yml'
      - '.github/workflows/deploy.yml'
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main

  # å…è®¸æ‰‹åŠ¨è§¦å‘
  workflow_dispatch:

# ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
env:
  PYTHON_VERSION: '3.10'
  DEPLOY_BRANCH: gh-pages

# ä»»åŠ¡å®šä¹‰
jobs:
  build:
    name: Build and Deploy Documentation
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      # æ£€å‡ºä»£ç 
      - name: Checkout Repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v3
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0  # è·å–å®Œæ•´çš„gitå†å²ç”¨äºæœ€è¿‘æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´

      # è®¾ç½®Pythonç¯å¢ƒ
      - name: Setup Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: ${{ env.PYTHON_VERSION }}
          cache: pip

      # ç¼“å­˜ä¾èµ–
      - name: Cache Dependencies
        uses: actions/cache@v3
        with:
          path: ~/.cache/pip
          key: ${{ runner.os }}-pip-${{ hashFiles('requirements.txt') }}
          restore-keys: |
            ${{ runner.os }}-pip-

      # å®‰è£…ä¾èµ–
      - name: Install Dependencies
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install -r requirements.txt

      # é…ç½®Git
      - name: Configure Git
        run: |
          git config --global user.name "${{ github.actor }}"
          git config --global user.email "${{ github.actor }}@users.noreply.github.com"

      # æ„å»ºæ–‡æ¡£
      - name: Build Documentation
        run: |
          mkdocs build --clean --verbose

      # ä¼˜åŒ–èµ„æº
      - name: Optimize Assets
        run: |
          # å‹ç¼©å›¾ç‰‡
          find site/ -type f -name "*.png" -exec optipng -o5 {} \;
          find site/ -type f -name "*.jpg" -exec jpegoptim --strip-all {} \;

          # å‹ç¼©JavaScriptå’ŒCSS
          find site/ -type f -name "*.js" -exec uglifyjs {} -o {} \;
          find site/ -type f -name "*.css" -exec cleancss -o {} {} \;

      # éƒ¨ç½²åˆ°GitHub Pages
      - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
        if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'  # åªåœ¨mainåˆ†æ”¯éƒ¨ç½²
        uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3
        with:
          github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          publish_dir: ./site
          publish_branch: ${{ env.DEPLOY_BRANCH }}
          user_name: 'github-actions[bot]'
          user_email: 'github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com'
          commit_message: ${{ github.event.head_commit.message }}
          full_commit_message: |
            Deploy Documentation

            Commit: ${{ github.sha }}
            Workflow: ${{ github.workflow }}

            ${{ github.event.head_commit.message }}

      # éƒ¨ç½²å®Œæˆé€šçŸ¥
      - name: Deployment Status
        if: always()
        uses: actions/github-script@v6
        with:
          script: |
            const { owner, repo } = context.repo;
            const run_id = context.runId;
            const run_url = `https://github.com/${owner}/${repo}/actions/runs/${run_id}`;

            if (context.job.status === 'success') {
              await github.rest.issues.createComment({
                owner,
                repo,
                issue_number: context.issue.number,
                body: `âœ… Documentation deployed successfully!\nPreview: https://${owner}.github.io/${repo}/\nWorkflow: ${run_url}`
              });
            } else {
              await github.rest.issues.createComment({
                owner,
                repo,
                issue_number: context.issue.number,
                body: `âŒ Documentation deployment failed.\nSee details: ${run_url}`
              });
            }

# é”™è¯¯è¿½è¸ªå’ŒæŠ¥å‘Š
      - name: Report Errors
        if: failure()
        uses: actions/github-script@v6
        with:
          script: |
            const { owner, repo } = context.repo;
            const run_id = context.runId;

            await github.rest.issues.create({
              owner,
              repo,
              title: `ğŸ”´ Documentation deployment failed - ${new Date().toISOString()}`,
              body: `Deployment failed for commit: ${context.sha}\n\nSee workflow run: https://github.com/${owner}/${repo}/actions/runs/${run_id}\n\nPlease check the logs for more details.`,
              labels: ['deployment', 'bug']
            });
    December 13, 2024 01:28:30 November 19, 2024 14:52:09
